GK16visa07cu:1: iha hi prathamataḥ kāvye doṣaguṇarītyalaṅkārāṇāmavasthitikramo daśitaḥ,
GK16visa07cu:2: saṃprati ke ta ityapekṣāyāmuddeśakramaprāptānāṃ doṣaṇāṃ svarūpamāha---
GK16visa07cu:5: (vi, ka) iha hi prathamataḥ prathamaparicchede doṣānāmavasthitikramo 'vasthitiprakāro darśita ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:11: atra ca rītyalaṅkārāṇāmiti pāṭhastu uddeśavyutkrameṇa lekhakapramādaparamparayaiveti lakṣyate /
GK16visa07cu:14: (lo, a) kāvyasvarūpaṃ nirūpya doṣān nirūpayitukāmaḥ tatprastāvaṃ darśayati /
GK16visa07cu:36: pade tadaṃśe vākyer'the saṃbhavanti rase 'pi yat // VisSd_7.1 //
GK16visa07cu:39: (lo, i) te punariti--te doṣāḥ padatadaṃśādipañcake sthitā yasmāt vākyārthabhūtasyāsvādasyāpakarṣakāraṇāni tasmāt pañca prakārāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:50: aprayuktatā ityatra dvandvottarasya bhāvapratyayasya pratyekamabhisambandhāt duḥ śravatvādaya eva doṣāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:51: etadādyavimṛṣṭavidheyāśabhāvāntāḥ trayodaśa doṣāḥ padavākyayoḥ pade vākye 'pi sambhavanti ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:54: nirarthakatvamasamarthatvaṃ cyutasaṃskāratā ceti doṣatrayaṃ paraṃ kevalaṃ pade natu vākye ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:57: (lo, ī) tatra ke doṣāḥ kiniṣṭā ityata āha--duḥ śraveti /
GK16visa07cu:69: etacca vīrabībhatsaraudrān rasān vihāya iti bodhyam,
GK16visa07cu:72: samagrapadavyāpakatve tu pratikūlavarṇatvadoṣa eva ityadi boddhavyam /
GK16visa07cu:90: tatra vrīḍājugupsayoḥ kārakatvaṃ maṅgalasya ca jñāpakatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:97: (vi, cha) dṛptārīti---sādhanaṃ senā ca cārthaḥ prākaraṇikatvāt anekārthasya sādhanaśabdasya vācyaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:105: he tanvi / tava vināśe adarśane sati tadā mama duḥ khotpādanāya vāyuḥ śanaiḥ mandaṃ prasasāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:111: (lo, ū) dṛpteti--atra sādhanaśabdo hastyaśvādisādhanārthe prayuktaḥ puṃdhvajasya,
GK16visa07cu:113: vināśaśabdaśca adarśanārthe maraṇasya ca smāraṇāt kameṇa vrīḍādivyañjakāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:120: (vi, jha) dṛpteti--atra sādhanaśabdo hastyaśvādisādhanārthe prayuktaḥ puṃdhvajasya,
GK16visa07cu:122: vināśaśabdaśca adarśanārthe maraṇasya ca smāraṇāt krameṇa vrīḍādivyañjakāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:135: tena idānīntanānekakavibhiḥ prācīnaikakavinā vāsyā'dare 'pi doṣa eva /
GK16visa07cu:136: evañca “padmān hi me prāvṛṣi khañjarīṭān “iti naiṣadhakṛtā prācīnaikakavinā ādare 'pi doṣa eva /
GK16visa07cu:137: kāvyavyatirikte bhāṣāmātre tadādare tu adoṣa eva,
GK16visa07cu:159: yogaśastra eva na tu loke arthaśāstre vā /
GK16visa07cu:165: te ca manasi varttamānāḥ puruṣe apadiśyante iti /
GK16visa07cu:166: kiñcaivaṃ vaktṛboddhavyayoḥ śāstrānabhijñatvabodhādiṃ vinā doṣa iti /
GK16visa07cu:169: “āśaīḥ paramparāṃ vandyāṃ karṇe kṛtvā kṛpāṃ kuru” /
GK16visa07cu:170: atra vandyāmiti kiṃ bandībhūtāyāmuta vandanīyāmiti saṃdehaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:180: (lo, ḷ) vandyāmiti--asya saptamyantatvena dvitīyāntatvena ca sambhavāt prakaraṇābhāvena vinigamanābhāvāt sandehaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:186: aśaktikṛtaṃ kaverasāmarthyamātreṇa kṛtaṃ na tu rūḍhiprayojanayoḥ anyatareṇa kṛtamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:195: darśitaṃ hi sthāne sthāne lakṣyārthāteśayaḥ prayojanamiti cet, na /
GK16visa07cu:198: prakṛte nirjitatve lakṣyārthe mukhaniṣṭhaśobhājanyatvameva vivakṣito yogaścaraṇāghāte mukhyārthe cālīke tacchobhābhāvāt tajjanyatvanirjitatvaṃ na pratīyata eva /
GK16visa07cu:199: tataśca tadapratītyā asyā lakṣaṇāyāḥ kaviprayogānarhatvajñānena aśraddheyatvāt lakṣyārthatiśayaḥ prayojanaṃ na pratīyate eva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:212: yamunāyāḥ śambaraṃ jalam ambaram ākāśaṃ vyatānīt vyāptamityarthaḥ “ambu śambum” iti koṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:215: atra tu prasiddhivaśāt liṅgānanusandhāne 'pi padamātreṇaiva prathamataḥ tadupasthityavalambanāt liṅgasyānvayasya ca bodhāttu paścādeva jalapratīteḥ
GK16visa07cu:224: atreti na ca ghadhātornānārthatvena dāne grahaṇe 'pi śaktirastyeva,
GK16visa07cu:225: āṅupasargeṇa tu dānabodhapratibandha evetyataḥ śakyārthe kathaṃ śaktibhrama iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:227: tadapekṣyā āḍupasargarahitasyaiva dāñaḥ dāne śaktirityasyaiva yuktatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:228: ḍudāñ dāne iti sāmānyataḥ śaktidarśanāttu śaktibhramaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:229: neyārthe tu bhramabījābhāvāt na bhrama iti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:230: ato neyārthatvalakṣaṇe śaktibhramābhāve sati iti viśeṣaṇādānādasāṅkaryam /
GK16visa07cu:231: avācake ca śaktibhramāt vivakṣitārthe tātparyasattvāt tātparyarūpāyā lakṣaṇāyā vivakṣitārthatvabodhakatvamastyeva iti /
GK16visa07cu:236: nirthakādidoṣapatrayasya tu vākyadoṣatvaṃ na sambhavatīti tadapāsyam /
GK16visa07cu:247: (vi, tha) yathā vā--“dinaṃ me tvayi saṃprāpte dhvāntacchannāpi yāminī /
GK16visa07cu:249: dhvāntacchannāpīti apikāreṇa dhvāntacchannatvaviparītabodhanāt prakāśamayatvasyaiva tadviparītabodhāt na tu dinatvasya /
GK16visa07cu:269: atra kṣīrodajā lakṣmīstasyā vasatiḥ padmaṃ tasya janmabhuvo jalāni /
GK16visa07cu:282: atreti---bhavasya patnītyarthe sādhitasya bhavānīśabdasya arthena patiśabdārthasya anvayavaśāt caitrasya bhāryāyāḥ patirityatra iva upapatipratītyānindā
GK16visa07cu:284: (lo, au) bhavānīśabdo bhavasya patnītyarthe nadādau ānapratyayāntaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:294: sa ca samabhivyāhārapratītisākṣiko na tu gata eva /
GK16visa07cu:295: tathā hi prāṅnirddiṣṭavidheyakaṃ bahuvrīhiṃ vinā samāsāntare vidheyasya pāte,
GK16visa07cu:296: asamāse tu uddeśyāt pūrvavidheyasya pāte tathātvam /
GK16visa07cu:301: tasyedānīṃ vṛthātvamityataḥ ucchūnatve uddeśye vṛthātva vidheyam /
GK16visa07cu:302: taccātra karmadhārayasamāsagatatvenāvimṛṣṭamityarthaḥ bahuvrīhisamāse prāṅnirddiṣṭaṃ vidheyaṃ tu vidheyatayaiva pratīyate /
GK16visa07cu:304: “nirmṛṣṭarāgo 'dhara“ityatra rāge nirmṛṣṭatvasya citragurityatra gavicitratvasya ca vidheyasya vidheyatayaiva sārvalaukikī pratītiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:305: na tu karmadhāraye vidheyapāte tadavimarśa iti satyam /
GK16visa07cu:308: “ṣaṣṭhabāṇa iva pañcaśarasya“ityatra bāṇe uddeśye 'nvayi ṣaṣṭhatvaṃ vidheyamavimṛṣṭam /
GK16visa07cu:309: yatra tūddeśyatāvacchedake vidheyamanveti tatra vidheyatayaiva pratīteḥ ānubhāvikatvānna doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:310: yathā“eṣvayamatyanvapaṇḍita“ityatra atyantasya vidheyasya uddeśyatāvacchedake pāṇḍitye evānvayo vidheyatayaiva pratītiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:311: evaṃ“nitāntasundarīkāntā“ityatrāpi saundarye 'nvitasya nitāntatvasya eva---“anirddayopabhogasya rūpasya mṛdunaḥ kathaṃ /
GK16visa07cu:312: kaṭhinaṃ khalu te cetaḥ śirīṣasyeva bandhanam //
GK16visa07cu:314: tathā ca prakṛte 'pi ucchūnatvena uddeśyatāvacchedakenānvitasya vṛthātvasya kathamavimṛṣṭatvam. ucchūnabhuje vṛthātvasya tu kiṃpadenaiva uktatvāt
GK16visa07cu:315: yattu kāvyaprakāśakṛtā asyaiva ślokasya prathamacaraṇe“nyakkāro hyayameva me yadahayaḥ';
GK16visa07cu:317: atra caraṇe ucchūnatvamātraṃ cānuvādyaṃ natu vṛthātvaviśeṣitam“ityuktam,
GK16visa07cu:321: tathā hi svargaviluṇṭhane ucchūnatvameva janyate natu tad vṛthātvaṃ vṛthātvaviśeṣitamucchūnatvaṃ vā /
GK16visa07cu:323: ato viluṇṭhanasya janakatāsambandhena vṛthocchūnatve 'nanvayādabhavanmatayogadoṣa eva darśitaḥ na cābhavanmatadoṣasya vākyamātragāmitvameva tenoktaṃ kathaṃ,
GK16visa07cu:330: ayamāśayaḥ-- tatpuruṣasamāse uttarapadasyaiva prādhānyāt vṛtheti pūrvapadasya vidheyasya prādhānyenānirddeśādavimṛṣṭavidheyāṃśo doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:332: iha vakturdaśamukhasyāyamāśayaḥ--purā mama bhujānāṃ yad ucchūnatvaṃ sthitaṃ taditānīṃ vṛthābhūtamiti /
GK16visa07cu:333: evaṃ vidheyatvena vivabhitasya vṛthātvasya samāse guṇībhāvādanuvādyatvapratyayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:334: tena ca pūrvato bhujānāmucchūnatvasya vṛthātvābhāvād bhujānāmapakarṣa eva pratīyate na bhujavikṣepaṇotkarṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:344: atra rāmasambandhādevāyamahaṅkāra ityato rāmasambandhabodhikāyāḥ ṣaṣṭhyāḥ tatpuruṣe lopāt rāmasambandhasya vidheyasāvimarśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:350: na khalu tasya kevalasya mukhyatā kintu rāmasambandhina ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:361: (vi, pha) yathā veti---atra samudraparyyantatvasya vidheyasya samāse 'vimarśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:365: (lo, i) ṣaṣṭha iti--atra utprekṣāviṣayatvena vivakṣitasya ṣaṣṭapadasya tatpuruṣasamāse pūrvānikṣepo na yukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:376: tathā ca mocanābhāvasya evātra vidheyatvāt asamāsenaiva tathātvaṃ bodhayitumucitamityāha---vidheyatvamevocitamiti /
GK16visa07cu:377: samāse tu tadbhannatvasya eva pratītyā paryyudāsatvameva tatra tu vidheyasya pratīṣedho na pratīyate itadyatastasyāvimarśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:385: jugopātmānamatrasta ityādau iva vidheḥ prādhānya yatra nāsti /
GK16visa07cu:386: navajaladhara ityādisamanantaroktodāharaṇavat yatra pratiṣedhasya prādhānyaṃ kiyayā kaṇṭhoktayā adhyāhāryyayā vā astibhavatyādirūpayā paryyudāsatāpātātparyyudāsayogakṣemāpatteḥ
GK16visa07cu:390: uktodāharaṇo tu tatpuruṣasamāse guṇībhāve nañaḥ paryudāsatayā niṣedhasya vidheyatayānavagamaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:393: (vi, bha) asamāse eva nañarthasya vidheyatvarūpaṃ prādhānyaṃ,
GK16visa07cu:394: pratiyoginastvaprādhānyaṃ tādṛśasthale nañaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhatvam ityatra samvādamāha---aprādhānyamiti /
GK16visa07cu:398: tathātvaṃ kīdṛśaprayogamityatrāha---kriyayeti---na pacatītyādau ākhyātakriyayā saha samāsābhāvāt ;
GK16visa07cu:400: tathā ca asamāse yatra nañ ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:401: ata evātra muktakriyayā nañaḥ sāhitye 'pi asamāsābhāvāt na prasajyapratiṣedhatā /
GK16visa07cu:403: amuktetyatra tu samāsāt na tathātvamityāha---uktodāharaṇe tviti /
GK16visa07cu:414: vidheyapratiyogibhūtābhāvasya pratiṣedhe naño 'pradhānatā samāsavaśāt apratīyamānavidheyatārūpāpradhānatā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:419: na pacatītyatra uttaratra nañsattvāttu na paryyudāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:420: idamatrāvadheyam---pratiyogipadottaranañsattve samāsāsambhavāt yatrottaretyādinā samāsastha eva paryyudāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:422: na dṛptaniśācara ityatra pūrvapatitasyāpi nañaḥ paryyudāsatvāt yatrottaretyādeḥ pralāpatvāpatteḥ /
GK16visa07cu:423: yadyapyasamāsasthasyāpi ghaṭo netyatra paryyudāsatvam asamāsasthasya kriyānvayinaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhatvamiti tu niyataṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:424: samāse kṛdantakriyānvayino 'pi paryyudāsatvāt asamasteti kriyāviśeṣaṇaṃ samāse paryyudāsatvameva /
GK16visa07cu:429: atrātrastatādyanūdyātmagopanādyeva vidheyamiti nañaḥ paryudāsatayā guṇībhāvo yuktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:432: (vi, ya) ityasya udāharaṇaṃ darśayati--jugopeti--evaṃ ca nañaḥ paryyudāsatve tadarthasya samāse vidheyatvāpratīteḥ ityāha /
GK16visa07cu:433: yukta ityatra vidhayasya nañarthasya avimarśa eveti sādhitam /
GK16visa07cu:440: nanu “aśrāddhabhojī brāhmaṇaḥ” “asūryaṃpaśyā rājadārāḥ” ityādivat “amuktā” ityatrāpi prasajyapratiṣedho bhavatīti ced ?
GK16visa07cu:441: na, atrāpi yadi bhojanādirūpakriyāṃśena nañaḥ sambandhaḥ syāttadaiva tatra prasajyapratiṣedhatvaṃ vaktuṃ śakyama,
GK16visa07cu:442: na ca tathā ; viśeṣyatayā pradhānena taddhojyārthena kartraṃśenaiva nañaḥ sambandhāt /
GK16visa07cu:448: yadi kriyāṃśe nañaḥ sambandhaḥ syāt tadaiva prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ syāt “kiyayā saha yatra naña“iti vacanāt /
GK16visa07cu:449: iha tu śrāddhabojanaśīlādayamanya iti kartraṃśenaiva sambandhāt nañaḥ paryyudāsatvameveti /
GK16visa07cu:460: pratītidarśanāt tad dṛṣṭāntena amuktetyatrāpi mocanābhāvarūpasya pratiṣedhasya vidheyasya
GK16visa07cu:464: akṣoddhetyanayorapi yadi bhajanadarśanakriyayornañarthasyānvayaḥ syāt tadaiva tathātvāpādanaṃ sambhavati /
GK16visa07cu:465: tayoranvaya eva tatra netyāha--- na ca tatheti /
GK16visa07cu:467: karttari vihitābhyāṃ kṛtpratyayābhyāmupasthāpitena bhojirūpakartraṃśena ca sahaiva naño nañarthasya sambandhāt ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:470: kṛtpratyayena kartrupasthānāt śrāddhabhojī ityatra bhojanakarttaiva pratīyate ityatra samvādamāha--yadāhuḥ--śrāddhabhojaneti /
GK16visa07cu:471: atra kṛtpratyayādevaṃ darśanakarttāro rājadārā api pratīyante ityapi bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:472: tathā ca tayorapi śrāddhabhojibhinnasūryyadarśakabhinnatvam ityevaṃ paryyudāsa eva pratīyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:473: tathā ca samāsasthatannañ--dṛṣṭāntenāpyamuktā ityatra samāsasthanañaḥ paryyudāsatvameva sidhyatīti manasikṛtya amuktetyatra bhojītyataḥ kiñcinmātraṃ valakṣaṇyaṃ darśayati /
GK16visa07cu:479: iha tu bhāṣyakārādimatamāśritya kiyānvayāṃśāpekṣayā prasajyapratiṣedhārthasvīkāre 'pi amuktetyādau /
GK16visa07cu:482: “amuktā” ityatra tu kriyayaiva saha saṃbandha iti doṣa eva /
GK16visa07cu:489: na pacati na nidrāti ityanvaye kartturupasthāne 'pi nidrāpākakṛtyorevānvayāt atha niyamābhāve 'pi tātparyyavaśāt tatra karttaryyeva nañarthānvaya iti cenna /
GK16visa07cu:491: śrāddhābhojanaśīlānvaye tu śrāddhabhojanaśīlabhinna iti pratītau na kadacit bhojanakṛt api pratīyate ityato granthakṛtānavadhānādeva itthaṃ samādhānaṃ kṛtam /
GK16visa07cu:494: tathā ca śrāddhamātrabhojītyarthalābhe mātrārthavaśāt śrāddhabhojanaśīlalābha iti brūmaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:496: ete ca kliṣṭatvādayaḥ samāsagatā eva padadoṣāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:501: samāsagatā eveti natu asamāse 'pi padadoṣā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:503: anāsattyadhīnakliṣṭatve tu samāsasya evāsambhavāt padagatatvaṃ nāsti /
GK16visa07cu:504: viruddhamatikṛtaḥ padārthantarānvayenaiva duṣṭatvāt avimṛṣṭavidheyāṃśasya cānuvādyavidheyārthakapadadvayaghaṭitatvāt vā samāsaṃ vinā padatvāsambhavāt
GK16visa07cu:509: (vi, śa) eṣāṃ trayodaśānāṃ padagatatvaṃ darśayitvā vākyagataṃ tu darśayitumārabhate /
GK16visa07cu:514: ataḥ śrutikaṭvādīnāṃ kvacit padāṃśaniṣṭatve 'pi bahuvyāpitvena vākyagatatvaṃ boddhavyam /
GK16visa07cu:551: lakṣitena padena ca padmarāgamaṇirucyate ityarthaḥ na ca pratyayānāṃ kṛtyarthānvitasvārthabodhakatvāt kathamatra tṛtīyayā padmārage karaṇatā bodhyate iti vācyam ,
GK16visa07cu:555: vastutastu vāmāvakrāpadayoḥ paryyāyaikyadarśanasya śaktibhramabījasya sattvāt atra avācakatvameva yuktam /
GK16visa07cu:559: atra dhammillasya śobhāṃ prekṣya kasya mānasaṃ na sajyatīti saṃbandhaḥ kliṣṭaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:568: atra cāyameva nyakkāra iti nyakkārasya vidheyatvaṃ vivakṣitam /
GK16visa07cu:576: anuvādyamanuktvaiva na vidhayamudīrayet iti niyamāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:577: ata eva vahnimān parvata iti na prayujyate /
GK16visa07cu:578: nanu vidheyapadasya pūrvanipātena doṣe padadoṣatvameva ucitamityata āha---racanā ceti
GK16visa07cu:581: tatra dharmmiṇamuddiśya sādyadharmmovidhīyate ityanusāreṇa prathamamanūdya vidheyo nyakkāraḥ paścānnirddiṣṭumucitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:583: ata eva śabdo 'nitya iti vaktavye 'nityaḥ śabda iti vacanena ca prāptaṃ nigrahasthānamāhuḥ /
GK16visa07cu:584: tathā hi kathamatra vākyadoṣa ityata āha---racaneti /
GK16visa07cu:585: padadvayasya viparītatāyāmeveti padaṃ nirddiśya paścānnyakkāra iti padasya ca paścānnirddeśyasya prathamanirddeśāt /
GK16visa07cu:587: vṛthocchūnairityatrāpi avasthānasattve pūrvamatra padadoṣatvamudāhṛtaṃ tatra nyakkāra ityādyanapekṣā granthagauravabhayāt /
GK16visa07cu:591: tacchabdasamānārthatayā pratipādyamānā idametadaḥ śabdā vidheyā eva bhavituṃ yuktāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:595: ya ānandayati asau samāgata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:597: yacchabdasya nirākāṅkṣatvapratipattaye pratipadyamānā idametadadaḥ śabdāḥ ityanena teṣāṃ sarvatra tacchabdābhidhānamiti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:599: vinā doṣāsaṅgaṃ satataparipūrṇākhilakalaḥ kutaḥ prāptaścandro vigalitakalaṅkaḥ sumukhai / te” //
GK16visa07cu:611: “yaḥ sa te nayanānandakaraḥ subhru / sa āgataḥ” /
GK16visa07cu:614: (vi, ga) vidheyārthakasyādaḥ śabdasya uddeśyārthakāt yacchabdāt paranipāte 'pi sānnidhyavaśāt vidheyatvāpratītyā etaddeṣamudāharati---āvandayatīti
GK16visa07cu:615: atra yaste netre ānandayati asau samāgata iti bodhe yacchabdārthe 'nuvādyo 'daḥ śabdārtho vidheyaḥ,
GK16visa07cu:616: tasyāvimarśaṃ grāhayitum adaḥ śabdasya vidheyataucityaṃ darśayati---yattadoriti /
GK16visa07cu:622: tathā ca tacchabda iva idametadadaḥ śabdā api ākāṅkṣāpūrakatvena vidheyārthakatayauva vidheyā bhavituṃ yuktā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:629: yaḥ sa te iti yaḥ prasiddha ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:635: tathā sati teṣāṃ vidheyatvaṃ sphuṭamavagamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:643: nirākāṅkṣatvagamakasyaiva ca vidheyatvāpratītiviṣayatvamityatastato nāvimarśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:658: “yaṃ sarvaśailāḥ parikalpya vatsaṃ merau sthite dogdhari dohadakṣe /
GK16visa07cu:663: ekasyaivopādāne tu nāyaṃ vicāra ityāha---yatra ca yattadoriti /
GK16visa07cu:668: yatpāpamarthāt svaniṣṭaṃ tadātmā jānāti ityarthaḥ--evaṃ yaṃ sarveti /
GK16visa07cu:681: (vi, ca) yattadornityasākāṅśratvena tacchabdamātropādāne yacchabdasyārthatvaṃ prasaṅgāddarśayati---tacchabdasya iti /
GK16visa07cu:685: kriyate tathā vālikāryam api sugrīveṇa karttavyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:692: sa ityanena yaḥ prakṛto rāmacandraḥ sa iti /
GK16visa07cu:693: tatra sa ityanena yaḥ sakalalokaprasiddhaḥ sarvajñātvādiguṇāviśiṣṭaḥ tādātmyāyātmana ekābhāvāpattaye /
GK16visa07cu:694: tāṃ yā tadguṇaviśiṣṭatayā anubhūtetyādiṣu yada ārthatvam /
GK16visa07cu:696: yatra ca yacchabdanikaṭasthitānāmapīdamādiśabdānāṃ bhinnaliṅgavibhaktitvaṃ tatrāpi nirākāṅkṣatvameva /
GK16visa07cu:704: yatra ya ādhārastadadhikāraṇamityatra iva idaṃ pade vidheyasya bhū,
GK16visa07cu:707: yaḥ indurvibhāti tena pathikayoṣito dagdhā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:718: “na me śamayitā ko 'pi mārasyetyuvi / mā śucaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:720: atra yo 'sti, sa te bhārasya śamayiteti budhyate /
GK16visa07cu:725: he urvi / me bhārasya śamayitā ko 'pi na,
GK16visa07cu:730: vyākhyātaṃ ca tacchabdārthāvagamaṃ vināpi yathoktabālakasattvasya yata iti uttaravākyagatatayā kāraṇahetutvāvagamād uttaravākyagatayacchabdasya tacchabdānapekṣaṇāt /
GK16visa07cu:731: kintu--- “ye nāma kecidiha naḥ prathayantyavajñāṃ jānanti te kimapi tān prati naiṣa yatnaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:732: utpatsyate 'sti mama ko 'pi samānadharmā kālo hyayaṃ niravadhirvipulā ca pṛthvī //
GK16visa07cu:733: iti yo bhavabhūterahaṅkāraślokaḥ kāvyaprakāśakṛtā yattadordvayoranupādānodāharaṇaṃ darśitaṃ tadevodāharaṇaṃ bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:734: tatra utpatsyamānasya dharmiṇo viśeṣyāniścitatvāt yattadbhyāṃ sāmānyata eva ya utpatsyate taṃ prati yatna ityuktaucityāt /
GK16visa07cu:737: ityatraiko yacchabdaḥ sākāṅkṣa iti na vācyam,
GK16visa07cu:738: tathāhi---yadyadityanena kenacidrūpeṇa sthitaṃ sarvātmakaṃ vastu vivakṣitam /
GK16visa07cu:742: (vi, jha) yacchabdasyottaravākyagatatve eva tacchabdasya nirākāṅkṣatvaṃ darśitam /
GK16visa07cu:744: tathāpi vīpsitayacchabdasthale ekayatpadākāṅkṣaiva ekatatpadena nivarttatām anyad yatpadaṃ tu sākāṅkṣamevasyāt /
GK16visa07cu:745: tathā ca---yad yad virahaduḥ khaṃ me tadityatra ekaṃ yatpadaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃsyāt ityāśaṅkya samādhatte--iti na vācyamiti /
GK16visa07cu:747: yena kenacit ityasyāyamabhiprāyo vīpsayā tāvat samastā vyaktaya upasthāpyante /
GK16visa07cu:748: tā vyaktaya eva tatpadena ca parāmarśa yadi vaktustātparyyaṃ tadā ekatatpadenaiva samastavyaktipāramarśāt yatpadadvayākāṅ kṣāpūraṇāt na tatpade vīpsā /
GK16visa07cu:752: yadi vīpsitayatpadadvayena tadvyaktitvena eva upasthāpayituṃ vakātustātparyyaṃ tadā bhavatyeva tatpade 'pi vīpsā /
GK16visa07cu:753: yathā “yaṃ yaṃ vyatīyāya patiṃ varā sā vivarṇabhāvaṃ sa sa bhūmipālaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:754: “ityatra “yāṃ yāṃ priyaḥ praikṣata kātarakṣīṃ sā sā hriyā namraṃmukī babhūta /
GK16visa07cu:762: tatra aprayuktasya vākyagatatve yathā--“sa pātu vo duścyavano bhāvukānāṃ paramparām /
GK16visa07cu:767: atra padadoṣānantaraṃ padāṃśadoṣāṇām uddeśyakamaprāptatve yeṣāṃ vākyadoṣāṇāṃ padadoṣasajātīyatvena prathamaṃ kathanaṃ,
GK16visa07cu:768: “nyakkāro hyayameva“ityādeśca padadoṣajātīyatve 'pi avimṛṣṭavidheyāṃśasya viśeṣatvenaitat prastāva evodāharaṇam /
GK16visa07cu:776: (vi, ña) tadgaccha siddhyai kuru devakāryyamityatra iti śrutikaṭuḥ /
GK16visa07cu:786: anirddiṣṭakālakāḥ pratyayāḥ triṣvapi kāleṣu bhavantītyanusāsanāt traikālikakriyāsveva tasya sādhutvāt /
GK16visa07cu:788: kintu lakṣaṇīya eva sā lakṣaṇā na neyārthā /
GK16visa07cu:791: (lo, u) vijeya ityanena vijetuṃ śakya eva pratipādyate natu vijitatvam /
GK16visa07cu:800: atra vacaḥ śabdasya gīḥ śabdavācakatve neyārthātvam /
GK16visa07cu:806: na gīrvacaḥ śabdayordvayorapi vācyavācakatvena vākyabāṇatvarūpayogārthena devārthe kathaṃ śabdalakṣaṇeti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:807: bāṇaśabdapūrvavarttino gīḥ śabdasya parivṛttyakṣamatvāt vacobāṇaśabdena devābodhanāt /
GK16visa07cu:809: śaktisattvādeva naca deve lakṣaṇā kintu gīḥ śabdabodhasya ānubhavikatvāt,
GK16visa07cu:811: na caivaṃ gīḥ śabdo vāṇatvameva pratyetumucitam,
GK16visa07cu:813: lakṣitagīḥ śabdenaikavākyabodhanāt tathā pratītiriti prapañcitamidamasmatkṛtakāvyaprakāśaṭīkāyāṃ vastravaidūryacaraṇairiti neyārthodāharaṇe
GK16visa07cu:821: (vi, ḍa) śareti pāṭha iti---tathā ca gīḥ śara iti na bhavati /
GK16visa07cu:826: tathā ca jalāśaya iti samudratvena rūpaemābodhakam /
GK16visa07cu:832: baḍaveti tenāśvānala iti na bhavati baḍavāgniriti tu bhavati /
GK16visa07cu:834: (lo, ṛ) vacaṛ śabdasyeti---atra vacobāṇaśabdena gīrvāṇo vivakṣitaḥ uttarapadameva parivṛttiṃ na sahata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:839: nirarthakatvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ ca padamātragatatvenaila lakṣye saṃbhavaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:844: tathāvidhadoṣāvahaṃ hi ko nāma mūḍhaḥ punaḥ punarabhidadhyāt /
GK16visa07cu:850: atra hantīti gamanārthe paṭhitamapi na tatra samartham /
GK16visa07cu:854: śaktisattve 'pi jaṅghāpaddhatirityādau pratyayaviśeṣopapadaviśeṣasahakāreṇaiva gatismāraṇasamarthaṃ na svata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:867: kanakaśilānibhaṃ kirātamūrttestrilocanasya vakṣo bhujābhyām ājaghne ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:873: nanvatra “ājadhne” iti padasya svato na duṣṭatā,
GK16visa07cu:874: api tu padāntarāpekṣayaiva ityasya vākyadoṣatā ? maivam /
GK16visa07cu:890: (lo, e) ājaghna ityatra na sakalasya padasya parivṛttyasahanam /
GK16visa07cu:892: tathā hi ājaghāna ityukte hanaprakṛtisadbhāve 'pi doṣasyābhāva ityāśaṅkya āha---yathāheti /
GK16visa07cu:902: svamate tu mādhuryaujaḥ prasādākhyāstraya eva guṇāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:904: ājaghne iti padasya doṣaśva padamātragāmīti darśayati---iha tviti /
GK16visa07cu:905: tasyānvayavāyatirekānuvidhāyitvaṃ tu tadarthakasya ājaghāna ityasya prajahāretyasya ca dānena doṣābhāvāt /
GK16visa07cu:910: padaikadoṣatāprasaktivāraṇāya ātmanepadapūrvavarttihandhātorapi tathātvamāha---yathehetyādi na padadoṣa iti /
GK16visa07cu:915: “bhāti padmaḥ sarovara” ityatroktaḥ puṃliṅgaḥ padmaśabdo 'prayukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:917: ādatte iti avācakapadasya śrutikaṭupadāderapi evaṃ nyāyāt padadoṣatetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:919: tathāhi----yadi uktanyāyāt aprayuktatvādyanekadoṣāṇāmapi padamātradoṣatvamuktaṃ tatkathaṃ smārārttyandhaḥ ityādiṣu teṣāṃ vākyagatatvamudāhṛtam
GK16visa07cu:922: atha teṣāmekavākyasthānekapadāvalambitvād vākyadoṣatā udāhṛtā iti cet tadā padamātradoṣatāprayojakatayā darśitanyāyakathanasya pramattagītataiva
GK16visa07cu:934: tena nirarthakatva yathā--- “payasāṃ pravāha iva saurasaindhavaḥ“atra surasindhorityetāvatāpi gatārthatve aṇ pratyayo nirarthakaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:939: nanu “kuñjaṃ hanti kṛśodarī“ityatra han prakṛtereva parivṛttayasahatvādasagarthasya padāṃśaniṣṭatvameva kathaṃ padaniṣṭatvamiti cet /
GK16visa07cu:940: atrocyate asamarthatvasya pṛthak padaniṣṭatvasya prāyeṇādarśanāt prakṛtipratyayau hi svārthabodhakau /
GK16visa07cu:941: ityanādṛtya samuditaṃ padaṃ vācakamiti matamālambya intītyatra padaniṣṭatvamevoktam /
GK16visa07cu:942: ata eva kāvyaprakāśakṛtāpi-- apāsya cyutasaṃskāramasamarthaṃ nirarthakam /
GK16visa07cu:954: (vi, da) idānīṃ darśitasvasvalakṣaṇānusāreṇaiva uktadoṣāṇāṃ parasparabhedasambhave 'pi bhedāntaramāha--iva śabdānāmiti /
GK16visa07cu:961: (lo, o) sarvathā prayogābhāvaḥ ata eva vākyadoṣamadhye 'gaṇanam /
GK16visa07cu:993: pade yo doṣaḥ vākye 'pi tādṛśadoṣasya sattvāt---tatsajātīyatā;
GK16visa07cu:996: (lo, a) samprati vakṣyamāṇānāṃ vākyadoṣāṇāṃ samanantarebhyo bhedadarśikāṃ kārikāmāha--evamiti /
GK16visa07cu:997: padadoṣāṇāṃ sajātīyāḥ śrutikaṭvādaya ubhayatra varttamānatvād vākyamātragāḥ na punaḥ śrutikaṭvādivat padatadaṃśavākyagāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1019: “ovaṭṭai ullaṭṭai saaṇo kahiṃpi moṭṭāai ṇo parihaṭṭai /
GK16visa07cu:1020: hiaeṇa phiṭṭai lajjāi khuṭṭai dihīe sā” //
GK16visa07cu:1021: atra ṭakārāḥ śṛṅgārasaparipanthinaḥ kevalaṃ śaktipradarśanāya nibaddhāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1022: eṣāṃ caikadvitricatuḥ prayoge na tādṛśagrasabhaṅga iti na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1028: muñcati no parihasati hṛdaye enaṃ paśyati,
GK16visa07cu:1036: lajjayā paśyati ca diśi diśi khidyati ca ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1042: ovaṭṭai iti---saṃskṛtacchāyā---“apavarttata udvarttate parivarttate śayane kasminnapi /
GK16visa07cu:1043: ramate no vilulitahṛdaye bhraśyati lajjayā truṭyati dhṛtau sā” //
GK16visa07cu:1048: ata eva tathāvidhānāṃ bahuvāraprayoge padadoṣasajātīyo vākyadoṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1064: āhateti---asya tu bahuśaḥ pāta eva doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1066: (lo, i) evaṃ ḷuptāhataprayogayorapi sakṛdeva prayoge na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1083: viśeṣapratipattyarthamiti---dhanurdharaṇādapyasau na māṃ vārayituṃ śakta ityartho viśeṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1088: kecittvāhuḥ---yatra viśeṣaṇasyāpi kriyāviśeṣaṇatvaṃ sambhavati tatrāpi tatprayogo na ghaṭate /
GK16visa07cu:1096: tadāha---kecittviti---atrāpi na yujyata iti prakāśābhiprāyamabuddhvā likhitaṃ vācprayogastu upapattyantarāsattvād yujyata eva /
GK16visa07cu:1097: kintu viśeṣaṇadānārthaṃ tatprayoga ityuktireva viśeṣaṇasya kriyāviśeṣaṇasambhavoktyā dūṣitā na tu vācamityasya prayogaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1102: tadupapattistu yathā---vacerdvidhā vuyatpattiḥ kaṇṭhatālvādyabhighātaḥ tajjanyaṃ vacanaṃ cārthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1103: tatra vacanārthakatayā prayoge vācamiti na prayujyate /
GK16visa07cu:1104: kaṇṭhatālvādyabhighātārthakatayā prayoge tu tatkarmabhūtasya vācamityasya yujyata eva prayoga iti /
GK16visa07cu:1117: (vi, ra) nyūnapadatvamāha---yadi mayīti---mama indratayā indratvena tadā kimityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1120: nūnaṃ prastutakāvyapratipādakasya cāsaṃmukhīnasya mahātmana eveti dṛṣṭipātena vakturabhiṣṭapūraṇamiti /
GK16visa07cu:1121: tasyānirddeśena yasya kasyacidapi dṛṣṭapātasūcanena tatpratyāyanamantharamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1126: atra visaśabdasya dhṛtaparisphuṭatatprasūnā iti sarvanāmnaiva parāmarśo yuktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1138: dhṛtavikāśitatkāḥ sainyāḥ senāsamavetajanāḥ visaṃ mṛṇālaṃ jakṣuḥ bubhujire /
GK16visa07cu:1159: idaṃ vṛttamiti dodhakaṃ nāma vṛttaṃ chanda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1164: ayamāśayaḥ--sāmānyato hāsasya śṛṅgārarasapratikūlyābhāve 'pi tathāvidhamānasthale smaraśaraviṣārdditasya nāyakasyoktau pratikūlateti
GK16visa07cu:1170: atra“pramuditasaurabha āgato vasantaḥ” iti pāṭho yuktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1174: kīdṛśaḥ vikasitasahakārabhārasya hārī manohārī parimola yatra tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1182: “anyāstā guṇaratnarohaṇabhuvo dhanyā mṛdanyaiva sā sambhārāḥ khalu te 'nya eva vidhinā yaireṣa sṛṣṭo yuvā /
GK16visa07cu:1183: śrīmatkāntijuṣāṃ dviṣāṃ karatalāt strīṇāṃ nigtabasthalāt dṛṣṭe yatra patanti mūḍhamanasāmastrāṇi vastrāṇi ca” //
GK16visa07cu:1191: evaṃ yairarthāt yadguṇaratnamṛdviśeṣasahitaiḥ sambhāraireṣa yuvā vidhinā sṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1192: yatra yūni dṛṣṭe sati mūḍhamanasāṃ dviṣāṃ karatalādastrāṇi mūḍhamanasāṃ strīṇāṃ nitambasthalād vastrāṇi ca patanti ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1206: “vastrāṇyapi” iti pāṭhe tu dārḍhyamiti na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1232: projjvalataḥ jvalanasya jvālāvat vikaṭā sundarī urusaṭānāṃ chaṭā kāntiryasya tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1233: śvāsenākṣiptāḥ pātitāḥ kulakṣmābhṛtaḥ kulācalā yena tādṛśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1265: (lo, o) marvante--marorante asau urvo iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1279: tṛtīyapāde viśeṣasya kriyānvayena vākyārthasamāptāvapi anākaṅkṣitaviśeṣaṇānvayārthaṃ viśeṣasyāvṛttirūpo 'tra doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1280: atra hi dhvāntanāśanenaiva kṣamātalabhāsanaprāptau tadviśeṣaṇam anākaṅkṣitam /
GK16visa07cu:1281: yatra tu viśeṣaṇe ākāṅkṣā tiṣṭhati tatra nāyaṃ doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1283: '; ityatra pramāṇādhikatvaviśeṣaṇaṃ vinā prakṛtaśvāsena stanevapathvajananāt śvāsasya pramāṇādhikatva ākāṅkṣā /
GK16visa07cu:1289: yāmeṇākṣīṃ vinā prāṇā viphalā me kuto 'dya sā” //
GK16visa07cu:1290: atra yacchabdaniddiṣṭanāṃ vākyānāṃ parasparanirapekṣatvāt tadekāntaḥ pātinā eṇākṣīśabdena anyeṣāṃ sambandhaḥ kaverabhimato nopapadyata eva /
GK16visa07cu:1298: yayā eṇākṣyā ityevameṇākṣīviśeṣyako 'nvayaḥ kaverabhipretaḥ sa ca na sambhavati /
GK16visa07cu:1304: tathā ca eṇākṣyāmeva sākāṅkṣatvāt tadviśeṣyaka eva /
GK16visa07cu:1305: yā yayetyānayorarthānvayaḥ kaverabhimataḥ sa ca na sambhavatītyāha---ekāntaḥ pātineti /
GK16visa07cu:1307: ekaṃ yatpadaṃ tadantaḥ pātinā tadarthānvayinā eṇākṣīśabdena eṇākṣīśabdārthena ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1308: anyeṣāṃ yā yayeti yacchabdārthānāṃ dvayorapyatra bahutvāropād bahuvacanam /
GK16visa07cu:1309: na cātra eṇākṣīmitipadasya vibhaktivyatyayena yā yayetyanayoranvaya iti bācyam,
GK16visa07cu:1321: “yāṃ vināmī vṛthā prāṇā eṇākṣī sā kṛto 'dya me” /
GK16visa07cu:1322: iti tacchabdanirdiṣṭavākyāntaḥ pātitve 'pi yacchabdaniddiṣṭavākyaiḥ sambandho ghaṭate /
GK16visa07cu:1325: (vi, gha) yadi tu tacchabdārthasya viśeṣyatayā eṇākṣīśabdaḥ prayujyate tadādoṣa ityāha---yāṃ vinā me vṛthā iti /
GK16visa07cu:1328: na ca tathāpiṃ bhinnavibhaktikayattatpadārthayoḥ kathamabhedānvaya iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:1330: yathā yatra dhūmaḥ sa deśo vāhnimān ityatra tatpadārthānvitasya prathamāntapadārthasya deśasya saptamyantayatpadārthe 'nvayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1339: atra yadityasya tadetyanena sambandho na ghaṭate /
GK16visa07cu:1343: (vi, ṅa) atra prathamamapi vyatyayamaṅgīkurvataḥ pratyudāharaṇāntaramāha---īkṣase yaditi /
GK16visa07cu:1348: tathā ca yadi kaṭākṣeṇa īkṣase tadā tena kaṭākṣeṇa manobhavaḥ dhanvī ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1353: atra vyomakāsāraśabdasya samāse guṇībhāvāttadarthasya na sarvaiḥ saṃyogaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1359: atreti---kāsāre rājahaṃsa ityevaṃśamāse tatpuruṣe uttarapadārthasya viśeṣyatvāt kāsāraśabdārthasya viśeṣaṇībhāva eva guṇībhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1361: tathā ca tasya payaḥ pūrādau viśeṣaṇībhāvena anvayāsambhava ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1363: ata eva caitrasya dāsabhāryyā ityatra bhāryyāyaṃ viśeṣaṇasya dāsasya caitraviśeṣyābhāvenānvaye sākāṅkṣataiva /
GK16visa07cu:1368: iha tu pradhānasya kāsārapadārthasya prādhānyenāpratīteḥ sarvo 'pi payaḥ pūrādiśabdārthastadaṅgatayā na pratīyata iti sarvavākyārthavirodhāvabhāsa ityubhayorbhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1373: kintu vidheyasya vidheyatvāpratītyā yadeva vidheyamavimṛṣṭaṃ tadeva duṣṭamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1375: uddeśyasambandhitayā vidheyatvāpratītyā uddeśyaghaṭitavākyasyānvayavyatirekād vākyadoṣatvād duṣṭaṃ tu vidheyapadamevetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1391: atra “bhārgavanindāyāṃ prayuktasya mātṛkaṇṭhacchedanakarttṛtvasya paraśunā sambandho na yuktaḥ” iti prācyāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1395: (vi, ja) vācyārthe vivakṣitasya vyaṅgyārthayogasyāsambhave 'pi kvacidayaṃ doṣa iti kāvyaprakāśakṛnmataṃ dūṣayitumāha---aneneti /
GK16visa07cu:1400: bhārgavasyādhikanindā kartaro adhikaṃ vaidagdhyaṃ dyotayati ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1403: samaya eva karoti bālabalaṃ praṇigadanta itīva śarīriṇām /
GK16visa07cu:1410: (vi, jha) akramateti--avyavadhānena taduttarapātaniyamenaiva tatparāmarśakasya śabdasya tatparāmarśārthamanyottarapātastattvam /
GK16visa07cu:1412: paruṣīkṛtāḥ duḥ śravīkṛtāḥ svarā yeṣāṃ tādṛśa mayūrā yatra kriyāyāṃ tādṛśaṃ yathā syāttathā śaradiṃ haṃsaravā ramaṇīyatām ayuḥ prāptavantaḥ
GK16visa07cu:1413: kīdṛśāḥ ? śarīriṇāṃ balābalaṃ samaya eva karotīti vinigadantaḥ kathayanta iti /
GK16visa07cu:1414: mayūraravāpekṣayā haṃsaravāṇāmapakṛṣṭatve 'pi śaradiṃ haṃsaravāṇāṃ paruṣīkaraṇāt samayena svarāṇāṃ balābalakaraṇāt śarīriṇāmapi balābalalābha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1416: atra ca śarīriṇāmapibalābalam iti anvaye kliṣṭatāpi bodhyā /
GK16visa07cu:1419: evaṃ sati praṇigadanta iti padasyāpi anuvādyavākyapraveśaśaṅketyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1422: kalā ca sā kāntimatī kalāvatastvamasya lokasya ca netrakaumudī” //
GK16visa07cu:1426: (vi, ña) dūyaṃ gataṃ samprati śocanīyatāmiti---tapasyantīṃ pārvatīṃ pratijaṭilaveśasya śivasya svanindāvākyamidam /
GK16visa07cu:1427: candrakalā eva prāk śocanīyā āsīt saṃprati tu tavāpi tathātvād dvayamiti /
GK16visa07cu:1428: nindrāpratipādanārthaṃ kapālavattvakathanaṃ kalāyāḥ prārthanā ca tatsamāgamādanumeyā /
GK16visa07cu:1435: (vi, ṭa) amateti---parārtho 'prakṛtārtho rūpyamāṇasvarūpo 'mataḥ prakṛtarasavirodharasavyañjakatvenānucitaḥ yatra tādṛśaṃ vākyamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1436: rāmamanmatheti--sā niśācarī rākṣasī tāḍakā eva niśācarī abhisārikā rāmasya eva manmathasya
GK16visa07cu:1437: kandarpasyaiva duḥ sahena śareṇa hṛdaye tāḍitā satī durgandhavad rudhiraṇaiva gandhadravyayuktaraktacandanaiva
GK16visa07cu:1438: ukṣitā jīviteśasya yamasyaiva jīviteśasya prāṇeśasya upanāyakasya vasatiṃ gatā ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1439: atreti---dvitīyor'tho rūpyamāṇaḥ manmathābhisārikādirūpaḥ aniṣṭaḥ anucitaḥ prakṛtavībhatsavirodhiśṛṅgāravyañjakatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:1441: (lo, u) jīviteśo yamaḥ prāṇeśaśca prakṛto rasaḥ bībhatsaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1448: (vi, ṭha) vācyasyānabhidhānamiti---vācyam avaśyaṃ vaktavyaṃ tasyoccāraṇenādhyāhāreṇa ca anabhidhānamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1452: atra tu vyatikramalavamapīti apikārādhyāhareṇāpi na vivakṣitasiddhiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1454: samāse tadā vyatikramalavaṃ padārthantaramapītyevamva bodhodayādato 'troccāraṇenādhyāhāreṇāvaśyaṃ vācyasyānabhidhānam /
GK16visa07cu:1462: atra tu na tathā adhyāhārasambhava ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1473: caraṇe ānataḥ kāntaḥ yasyāstasyāstava tathāpi kopa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1476: yadyapīti nirākāṅkṣam eva sambaddhaṃ bhavati tathāpīti tatra dvitīyavākyagatatve eva upapadyate ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1480: iha tu ṅasantaṃ padaṃ vihāyāsīti padaniveśanena ityanayorbhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1484: atra vacadhātunā prakrāntaṃ prativacanamapi tenaiva vaktumucitam /
GK16visa07cu:1493: atra vacdhātunā uddeśye prativacane 'pi vacdhātunāpi ākāṅkṣā iti darśayati---pratyavocateti /
GK16visa07cu:1495: anekavidhāḥ tatra vidhyatayā nirdeśyasya dharmasyaiva punarvidheyatayā ākāṅkṣitasya pratinirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1496: yathatraiva śloke rāvaṇe vidheyatayā nirdiṣṭasya vacanasya prativacanatvena vidheyatayā pratinirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1497: yathā vā--- udeti savitā tāmrastāmra evāstameti ca /
GK16visa07cu:1499: ityatra ekarūpatākathanād udyatsavitari vidheyatayā nirdiṣṭasya tāmratvasya astasavitaryyapi vidhayatayā pratinirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1500: (2) ekoddeśena vidhyasya vidheyāntare uddeśyatayā pratinirdeśa ityaparā /
GK16visa07cu:1502: ityatra jitendriyatvena vidheyasya vinayakāraṇatvasya śarīrapraviṣṭatayā vidheyasya vinayasya guṇaprakarṣavidhau uddeśyatayā pratinirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1504: yathā--te himālayamāmantrya punaḥ prekṣya ca śūlinam /
GK16visa07cu:1506: ityatra siddhārthanivedanavidhau uddiṣṭasya tatraiva vidheye uddeśyatayā punaḥ pratinirdeśa ityaparā /
GK16visa07cu:1518: ityatra hi yadi padāntareṇa sa evārthaḥ pratipādyate tadānyor'tha iva pratibhāsamānaḥ pratītiṃ sthagayati /
GK16visa07cu:1523: anyor'tha iveti nāviśiṣṭasyaiva nāmino bodha iti mate tāmraraktaśabdadvarūpaviśeṣaṇabhedād bhedāvabhāsa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1527: tathā ca sati rasānubhavavighna iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1532: atra “asmai” itīdamā prakrāntasya tenaiva tatsamānābhyāmetadaḥ śabdābhyāṃ vā parāmarśo yukto na tacchabdena /
GK16visa07cu:1535: (vi, tha) ekavidhau uddiṣṭasya vidheyāntare 'pyuddeśyatayā pratinirdeśe prakramabhaṅgamudāharati---te himālayamiti /
GK16visa07cu:1541: na caivaṃ tatpadenāpi sarvanāmnā tathaiva parāmarśādadoṣa iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:1542: tattu atra asmaiva iti idam śabdena buddhisthapurovarttitayā mahādevaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1543: tacchabdena viprakṛṣṭaparāmarśitayā tasya parāmarśaḥ kartuṃ na śakyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1547: atra “mitā bhūḥ patyāpāṃ sa ca patirapām” iti yuktaḥ pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1550: (vi, da) dharmibhedabhāsakatvena bhedāvabhāsādekoddeśena vidheyasya vidheyāntaroddeśyarūpeṇa pratinirdeśe 'pi taddoṣamudāharati---udanvaditi
GK16visa07cu:1551: bhūḥ udanvacchinnā sa cāpāṃ patiḥ yojanaśataṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhatīti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1552: atra bhuvamuddiśya udanvacchinnatve vidheye udanvānapi vidheyaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1553: tasya yojanaśatavyāptividhau uddeśyatayā apāṃpatiśabdena pratinirdeśaḥ kṛta iti doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1563: (vi, dha) evavidheye uddiṣṭasya tatraiva vidheye uddeśyatayā pratinirdeśasya pratyayārthasya kramabhaṅgamudāharati---yaśo 'dhigantumiti /
GK16visa07cu:1568: atra nirusukavidhāvuddiṣṭāyā icchāyāstatraiva nirutsukatvavidhau uddeśyatayā pratinirdeśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1592: ghora iti---sambandhaiviśeṣe eva śabdaviśeṣāṇāṃ prayoga ityatra kāvyaprakāśakṛduktisamvādamāha--mañjīrādiṣviti /
GK16visa07cu:1602: (vi, pha) asthānastheti---yādṛśasthānasattva eva yatpadasya bodhakatā tadbhinnasthānasthatvaṃ tattvam /
GK16visa07cu:1603: tvamasya lokasya ca ityatra tu uttarapaṭhitaniyatapadasya tathātvamatra tu tanniyamarahitapadasyeti bhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1604: tīrthe tadīye iti---asya rājño gajaiḥ setubandhāt pratīpagāṃ gaṅgam uttarato tadīye gāṅgīye tīrthe uttaradiśi nabholaṅghanalolapakṣā haṃsā ayatnabālavyajanībabhūvurityarthaḥ
GK16visa07cu:1605: setubandhena jalavṛddhyā prāvṛṭkālabuddhyā uttaradiśi mānasarovaragamanārthaṃ haṃsā uḍḍīnā iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1610: (lo, e) tadīya ityasya pūrvaṃ gaṅgāmityasya pāṭho yuktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1615: atra saṃśṛṇuta ityataḥ pūrvaṃ nañaḥ sthitirucitā /
GK16visa07cu:1616: atra ca padamātrasyāsthāne niveśe 'pi sarvameva vākyaṃ vivakṣitārthapratyāyane mantharamiti vākyadoṣatā /
GK16visa07cu:1621: yathā---“dvayaṃ gatam-” ityādau tvamityanantaraṃ cakārānupādānādakramatā tathātrāpīti /
GK16visa07cu:1629: hitānna ya iti akramadoṣodāharaṇamiti keṣāñcinmataṃ darśayati--iha ke 'pīti /
GK16visa07cu:1632: vācakameveti padāntare yogaṃ vinā prayogābhāvena pañcapadaṃ tripadamiti yathā na prayogaḥ tathā naño 'pi pratiyogipadayogaṃ vināprayogāt na tatra vācakatā,
GK16visa07cu:1634: ghaṭādipadasya tu svataḥ prayogāt tatra padatvaṃ nirvivādamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1638: tathā ca asthānasthapadatvodāharaṇaṃ tīrthe tadīye ityevetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1641: “adyāpi stanaśailadurgaviṣame sīmantinīnāṃ hṛdi sthātuṃ vāñchati māna eṣa dhigati krodhādivālohitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1642: prodyaddūrataraprasāritakaraḥ karṣatyasau tatkṣaṇā tphullatkairavakoṣaniḥ saradaliśreṇīkṛpāṇāṃ śaśī” //
GK16visa07cu:1643: atra kopina uktau samāso na kṛtaḥ,
GK16visa07cu:1650: niḥ saratām alīnāṃ śreṇībhūtaṃ kṛpāṇāṃ dūrataraṃ prasāritaḥ karo raśmireva tādṛśo
GK16visa07cu:1651: hasto yena tādṛśaḥ san tatkṣaṇāt karṣaṇe 'pi hastasya dūre prasāraṇāt /
GK16visa07cu:1663: atra nabho 'ṅgane candraṃ paśya mānaṃ muñceti yuktam /
GK16visa07cu:1677: ramaṇe iti---atra ramaṇe caraṇaprāntapatite satyadhunā krodho nocita iti vākyasya madhye vadāmi sakhi te tattvamiti vākyamanupraviṣṭam /
GK16visa07cu:1703: “vilokya vitate vyomni vidhuṃ muñca ruṣaṃ priye /
GK16visa07cu:1704: ” atra vitataśabdo mānatyāgaṃ prati na kiñcidupakurute /
GK16visa07cu:1712: pallavākṛtiraktoṣṭhītyatra hyākṛtiśabdasya niṣprayojanatvarūpo bādho 'nvayabodhasamakālameva pratibhāsata ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1748: tatra pragapakarṣe udāharati harantīti--iyaṃ lokalocanacandrikāsurūpā tanvī yauryuvabhirvokṣate teṣāṃ yūnāṃ hṛdayaṃ navendukalādayo na harantītyarthaḥ
GK16visa07cu:1756: yathāśu jāyate pāto na tathā punarunnatiḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:1762: stabdhasya bhadrābhadrāvivecinaḥ vivaraṃ parasya cchidraṃ tatra icchāmātraṃ natu pravṛttau tadapekṣā stabdhatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:1765: “varṣatyetadaharpatirna tu ghano dhāmasthāmacchaṃ payaḥ satyaṃ sā savituḥ sutā surasaritpūro yathā plāvitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1767: śraddhā na kasya śrutau na pratyeti tathāpi mugdhahariṇī bhāsvanmarīciṣvapaḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:1771: varṣatīti--kasyāścit kāminyāḥ kāntadūtīḥ prati anyāpadeśena sotkaṇṭhavacanamidam---ahaḥ
GK16visa07cu:1772: patiḥ sūryyo dhāmasthaṃ svīyaraśmistham etad dṛśyāmānaṃ payo varṣati natu ghano varṣati
GK16visa07cu:1774: tathā yayā surasarito gaṅgāyāḥ pūraḥ pravāhaḥ plāvitaḥ sā arthāt yamunāsavituḥ sūryyasya satyaṃ sutā /
GK16visa07cu:1775: kathametanniścitam ityatrāha---vyāsasyeti---vṛṣṭiyamunayoḥ sūryyaprabhavatvaṃ na khalu kenacidanāptenoktaṃ,
GK16visa07cu:1779: evaṃrūpāsu kālindyāḥ sūryyakanyātvabodhikāsu ca vyāsoktiṣu ko jano na viśvasiti kasya janasyā vā evamarthikāyāṃ śrutau vede na śraddhā ?
GK16visa07cu:1780: api pu sarva eva viśvasiti sarvasya ca śraddhā;
GK16visa07cu:1781: tathā ca hariṇyā api tatra viśvāsaśraddhaucityameva /
GK16visa07cu:1782: tathāpi mugdhā mūḍhā hariṇī bhāsvanmarīciṣu adhikaraṇeṣu jalaṃ na pratyeti /
GK16visa07cu:1783: dhāmasthamacchaṃ paya ityanena payasaḥ sūryyamarīcivṛttitayā vyāsaśrutibhyāṃ bodhitatvena tathā pratyayocityāt /
GK16visa07cu:1790: atra prakṛṣṭataraḥ prakṛtoyamarthaḥ-sa nāgaraḥ satyavāgiti prāmāṇikamevedam /
GK16visa07cu:1791: tasya dūtīnāṃ bhavatīnāṃ vāci satyapratyayo yujyate /
GK16visa07cu:1798: tathāpi mṛgī bhrāntatatvāttatra jalapratyayaṃ na karoti /
GK16visa07cu:1809: tatra marīciṣvadhikaraṇeṣu yamunājalasya sūryyaprabhavatvapradarśanāt pipāsayā yamunāyāmeva pravarttate tatra na jalāpratyayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1813: prākaraṇikaścātra nāyāyasiddhe 'pyarthe bhrāntānāṃ janānāṃ pratyayābhāva ityevaṃrūpaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1816: “sadā carati khe bhānuḥ sadā vahati mārutaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1817: sadā dhatte bhuvaṃ śeṣaḥ sadā dhīro 'vikatthanaḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:1824: tathāpīti---prakārakṛtabhaṅgībhedābhāvādanavīkṛtatvamevetyarthaḥ yathā---“sadā carati khe bhānurnityaṃ vahati mārutaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1827: bhānuḥ sadeti--- ṣaṣṭhāṃśavṛtte rājño 'pi ṣaṣṭhāṃśagrahaṇaṃ prajāpālanarūpo dharma eṣaḥ sadaivetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1828: atra sadāsatataśabdayoḥ samānaprakārakatvasamānārthakatve 'pi rātrindivamityatrārthasyaiva sāmyaṃ rātritvadivātva prakārabhedaḥ
GK16visa07cu:1831: atrāsya padasya paryāyāntaraṇopādāne 'pi yadi nānyadvicchittyāntaṃ tadāsya doṣasya sadbhāva iti kathitapadatvādbhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1839: vibhartti śeṣaḥ satataṃ dharitrīṃ ṣaṣṭhāṃśavṛtterapi dharma eṣaḥ //
GK16visa07cu:1841: “gṛhītaṃ yenāsīḥ paribhavabhayānnocitamapi prabhāvādyasyābhūnna khalu tava kaścinna viṣayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1842: parityaktaṃ tena tvamapi sutaśokānna tu bhayā- dvimokṣye śastra /
GK16visa07cu:1849: he śastra / tvaṃ yena mama pitrā brāhmaṇajāternocitamanucitamapi paribhavabhayād drupadanṛpatitaḥ paribhavabhayād gṛhītamāsīḥ,
GK16visa07cu:1850: tathā yasya mama pituḥ prabhāvāt tava khalu na viṣayo na kaścid abhūdindo 'pi tvadviṣaya āsīdityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1851: tena mama pitrā sutasya hatatvena śrutasya mama śokāt natu bhayāt parityaktamasi ahamapi yatastvāṃ vimokṣeye,
GK16visa07cu:1856: (lo, i) śastramocana ityatra aśvatthāmna iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1865: atreti pitṛmaraṇānantarameva putrasya śrīlābhaḥ prāyaśa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:1867: “acalā abalā vā syuḥ sevyā brūta manīṣiṇaḥ ?” /
GK16visa07cu:1872: atreti---uktiniścayābhāvāt acalā eva abalā eva vā sevyā iti niścayābhāvāt sandeha ityarthaḥ /

GK16visa07cu:2363: (lo, i) tathā hīti--atra kāvyasya śaśinā na sādṛśyam /
GK16visa07cu:2370: atra rūpakatve 'pi sa eva doṣastasyapi sādṛśyamūlatvād upamānāsambhave---prajvaladiti -- prajvalantyo jaladhārā hmaprasiddhāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2375: ityatra daṇḍiṃ nā kvacitpadena straṣṭurvidheḥ kvacit sarvapadmaprabhāharaṇasambhāvanāṃ pradarśya tādṛśopamānenābhūtopamā darśitā /
GK16visa07cu:2376: ata eva bālapravāvalaviṭapaprabhāva lateva ityatrāpi vaṭādiviṭame latādarśanāt pravālaviṭape latāṃ sambhāvya tadupamā kṛtā /
GK16visa07cu:2377: prakṛte tu jale jvalanasya sarvathā bādhāt prajvalajjaladhārāyāḥ sambhāvanāśakyatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2404: kṣudre 'pi nūnaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapanne mamatvamuccaiḥ śirasāmatīva” //
GK16visa07cu:2409: yo himālayo guhāsu līnamandhakāraṃ divākarād rakṣati /
GK16visa07cu:2412: uccaiḥ śirasāṃ mahimnā uccamaulīnāmarthānmahatām uccaiḥ śikharāṇāṃ ca /
GK16visa07cu:2432: (vi, gha) sahaseti---sā sundarī nāyikā strigdhairālijanaiḥ saha sahasā sasmitā udite rajanīnāthe sahasā tatkṣaṇaṃ kuñjamandiraṃ yātītyarthaḥ
GK16visa07cu:2434: (lo, ṛ) ālijanaiḥ saha sārdhaṃ sahasā vegena sahasā hasena saha vartamānā /
GK16visa07cu:2442: “eṣa mūrto yathā dharmaḥ kṣitipo rakṣati kṣitim” /
GK16visa07cu:2447: dharmaḥ puṇyaṃ tasya mūrtyabhāvāttadutprekṣā na tu dharmarūpadevatopamā,
GK16visa07cu:2460: (lo, ḷ) vṛttiḥ niyatavarṇagato yo rasaviṣayo vyāpāraḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2495: atra lakṣmīsthānīyā vidyut hārasthānīyāyā bālākāyā nyūnatvamiti bhaṅgyā pratipādayati---atreti /
GK16visa07cu:2508: yalliṅgena ekadvyādiyadvacanena copameyoktyupakrama upamānasyāpi talliṅgakatvena tadvacanena coktirākāṅkṣitā tathātvānuktau kramabhaṅga ityarthaḥ
GK16visa07cu:2520: (lo, o) asyāmupamāyāṃ sarvadāpi bhavatītyanena upamānopameyayoḥ kālabhedaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2529: na khalu āsīt iti sārvadikśobhāsattve atītvena tadvivakṣābhāvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2539: ayaṃ ca svalpa eva doṣaḥ vyatyayena anvayasambhavāt /
GK16visa07cu:2540: ata eva sarvatra kāvye īdṛśa eva prayogaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2542: iha tu yatra liṅgavacanabhede 'pi na sādhāraṇadhaparmasyānyathābhāvastatra na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2547: (lo, au) iha tviti---ayamarthaḥ--yatra liṅgādibhede hi sādhāraṇadharṇo 'bhinnaupamānopameyayordvayorapi sambandhamāpādyate tatra na pratīti sthagayati /
GK16visa07cu:2552: dadhate sma parāṃ śobhāṃ tadīyā vibhramā iva” //
GK16visa07cu:2556: yadi tu nirdiṣṭarūpeṇaivobhayatrānvayasambhavastadā na doṣa ityāha---atra ca liṅgavacaneti /
GK16visa07cu:2558: atrābhātisādhāraṇadharma ubhayatraikarūpa eva liṅgadvayaṃ tu bhinnam /
GK16visa07cu:2560: madhuratayā ramyatayā bhṛtaḥ pūrṇastasyāveśaḥ parāṃ śobhāṃ dadhate dhatta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2564: tadīyā vibhramā iva--te 'pi hi parāṃ śobhāṃ dadhate /
GK16visa07cu:2593: savilāsaṃ gacchantīṃ veśyāṃ dṛṣṭvā śāntasya puruṣasyoktiriyam /
GK16visa07cu:2596: akāraṇam arthāt puṃsāṃ raṇaraṇakaṃ kāmacintāṃ kurute janayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2598: anaṇu analpaṃ raṇantī maṇiyuktā mekhalā yatra tādṛśam /
GK16visa07cu:2599: avirataṃśiñjanaṃ mañju mañjīraṃ nūpuraṃ yatra tādṛśam /
GK16visa07cu:2605: evaṃ samāsoktau sādhāraṇaviśeṣaṇavaśātparārthasya pratītāvapi punastasya śabdenopādānasyāprastutapraśaṃsāyāṃ
GK16visa07cu:2606: vyañjanayaiva prastutārthāvagateḥ śabdena tadabhidhānasya ca punaruktatvam /
GK16visa07cu:2621: aparadik pāścimadigena gaṇikā veśyā viyadrūpādālayād āśrayāt raviṃ nirakāsayat niṣkāsayāmāsa /
GK16visa07cu:2624: anu divasasya paścād rāgavantaṃ raktimāvantamapi ata eva locanayoḥ sukhaṃ sukhajanakam atāpakaṃ ca vapurdadhatamapītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2625: atra śliṣṭaviroṣaṇavaśādanurāgavato locanasukhajanakasuśītalavapuṣmato nāyakasya vasunā dhanena rahitatvāt svagṛharūpādālayāt veśyayā niṣkāsanaṃ vyañjanayā pratīyate /
GK16visa07cu:2630: (lo, i) anugato rāgaḥ śoṇimā, premā ca /
GK16visa07cu:2636: “āhūteṣu vihaṅgameṣu maśako nāyān puro vāryate madhye vā dhuri vā vasaṃstṛṇamaṇirdhatte maṇīnāṃ dhuram /
GK16visa07cu:2637: khadyoto 'pi na kampate pracalituṃ madhye 'pi tejasvināṃ dhiksāmānyamacetasaṃ prabhumivānāmṛṣṭatattvāntaram” //
GK16visa07cu:2641: anāmṛṣṭaṃ tattvāntaraṃ yena mahīyasāmalpīyasāṃ ca padārthānāṃ bhedo na prakāśyate /
GK16visa07cu:2642: sāmānyaṃ jātiḥ sāmānyasya sarvāsu vibhaktiṣu ekarūpeṇaivāvasthiterityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2643: anucitaṃ ca vyañjanayaiva pratyuta camatkārātiśayadāyitvena gatārthatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2650: anāmṛṣṭam aparibhāvitaṃ tattvaṃ yena tādṛśamantaraṃ mano yasya tādṛśaṃ prabhumiva /
GK16visa07cu:2651: sāmānyasya acetanatvaṃ darśayati---āhūteṣu vihaṅgameṣu vihāyasā gacchatsu janeṣu praṇiṣu āhateṣu vihāyogāmitvāt pura āyān āgacchan maśako 'pi na vāryate,
GK16visa07cu:2653: gamanamevātra vidheyaṃ bodhyaṃ tadeva sāmānye cetanatvapratipādanasambhavāt /
GK16visa07cu:2654: tathā tṛṇamaṇistu tṛṇākarṣako 'lpamūlyo maṇiḥ dhuri vā madhye vā vasan rathaśobhākārakamahāmūlyamaṇīnāṃ dhuraṃ rathaśobhākaraṇarūpaṃ dhuraṃ bhāraṃ vidhatte /
GK16visa07cu:2658: madhye vasan ityatra madhyevāridhi vā vasan iti kvacit pāṭhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2659: tadā ca madhye vāridheḥ madhye vā vasan punaḥ punarvasannityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2660: maṇīnāṃ vāridhvāsasādharmyānmahāmūlyamaṇīnāṃ dhuraṃ maṇitvena gaṇyatvarūpāṃ dhuraṃ bhāram ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2666: teṣām abhidhānavaśādeva acecasaḥ prabhoḥ vyañjanayā lābhe tadabhidhānaṃ punaruktamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2676: asya bhūbhujaḥ cakrādhiṣṭhitatāṃ rājamaṇḍalākramaṇaṃ cakrī viṣṇuḥ prayacchat dattavān /
GK16visa07cu:2679: atraiṣṭakarmasu eṣāṃ karttṛtvaprasiddhirnāsti kintu anuprāsārthameva tathoktam /
GK16visa07cu:2682: cakaprabhṛtīnāṃ ca cakradhiṣṭitatādimātreṇa praśaṃsanaṃ na khalu prasiddham /
GK16visa07cu:2691: raudrādau tu rase 'tyantaṃ duḥ śravatvaṃ guṇo bhavet // VisSd_7.16 //
GK16visa07cu:2694: (lo, ū) adhunā padaniṣṭatvena pañcadhā vibhaktānāmeṣāṃ doṣāṇāṃ kvacit keṣāṃcidanyathātvamityāha /
GK16visa07cu:2700: eṣu cāsvādasvarūpaviṣātmakatayā mukhyaguṇaprakarṣopakāritvādguṇa iti vyapadeśo bhāktaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2703: (vi, pa) vaktarīti---samuddhate pracaṇḍe bhīṣaṇe iti yāvat /
GK16visa07cu:2705: nanu mādhuryādaya eva guṇāstatkathaṃ duḥ śravatvāderguṇatvam ityatrāha---eṣu ceti /
GK16visa07cu:2707: teṣāṃ prakarṣarūpo ya upacāraḥ tatkāritvād aupacāriko guṇavyapadeśo yukta ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2713: “tadvicchedakṛśasya kaṇṭhaluṭhitaprāṇasya me nirdayaṃ krūraḥ pañcaśaraḥ śararatiśitairbhindanmano nirbharam /
GK16visa07cu:2718: (vi, pha) atra krodhasaṃyukte vaktari duḥ śravatvaguṇamāha---tadvicchedeti /
GK16visa07cu:2719: tasyā vicchedena kṛśasya kaṇṭhalulitaprāṇasya ca me manaḥ,
GK16visa07cu:2723: bhūte prārthini mayi kṛpayā evaṃ kariṣyati /
GK16visa07cu:2725: vicchedakaṇṭhaluṭhitādau chakāraṭhakārādayo varṇā duḥ śravāḥ kupatavaktṛkā guṇāḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2728: ūrdhvanyastāṅighradaṇḍabhramibhararabhasodyannabhasvatpravega- bhrāntabrahmaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ pravitaratu śivaṃ śāmbhavaṃ tāṇḍavaṃ vaḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:2738: śāmbhavaṃ tāṇḍavaṃ nṛtyaṃ vo yuṣmākaṃ śubhaṃ pravitaratu /
GK16visa07cu:2740: mūrddhavyādhūyamānāyā dhvanantyā amaradhunyā gaṅgāyā lolena kallolajālena taraṅgasamūhena
GK16visa07cu:2741: uddhūtānāṃ kṣiptānām ambhaḥ kṣodānāṃ jalakaṇānāṃ dambhāt chalāt prasabhaṃ sahasā
GK16visa07cu:2744: ūrddhvanyastayoraṅghridaṇḍayorbhramibhareṇa bhramyādhikyena rabhasodyataḥ sahasodracchataḥ nabhasvataḥ vayoḥ pravegeṇa bhrāntaṃ brahmaṇḍakhaṇḍaṃ yatra tādṛśam /
GK16visa07cu:2746: uddhataṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ utkṛtya ityādau bībhatso rasaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2749: raudre duḥ śravatvaṃ yathā mama tātapādānāṃ--- sphuṭavikaṭacapeṭāghātanenāyamaṣṭau sapadi kulagirīn vā khaṇḍaśaścūrṇayitvā /
GK16visa07cu:2758: “tāmbūladānavidhinā visṛjedvayasyāṃ vdyarthaiḥpadaiḥ piśunayecca rahasyavastu” iti kāmaśāstrasthitiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2765: tathāhi puṃso dhvajaḥ patākā sādhanasya sainyasyāntarmadhye praviśyopasarpan gacchan virājate /
GK16visa07cu:2770: tathāhi sambādhe saṃkucite sādhanasya yonerantaḥ praviśya upasarpan gatāgataṃ kurvan puṃso dhvajaḥ liṅgaṃ virājate /
GK16visa07cu:2783: yathā--- nirvāṇavairadahanāḥ praśamādarīṇāṃ nandantu pāṇḍutanayāḥ saha mādhavena /
GK16visa07cu:2784: raktaprasādhitabhuvaḥ kṣatavigrahāśca svasthā bhavantu kururājasutāḥ sabhṛtyāḥ //
GK16visa07cu:2791: dhvajaśca sādhanam aśvādi strīvarāṅgaṃ ca piśunayet sūcayet śamakathāyāmaślīlo yathā--- “lattānocchūnamaṇḍūkapāṭitodarasannibhe /
GK16visa07cu:2796: yathā---“parvatabhedi pavitraṃ jaitraṃ narakasya bahumataṃ gahanam /
GK16visa07cu:2803: tatra nihatārthāprayuktatvayordvayoradoṣatve śleṣe ekamudāharaṇamāha---parvatabheda pavitram iti /
GK16visa07cu:2804: patat pravahat surasarito gaṅgāyā ambho namat /
GK16visa07cu:2808: so 'pi hi parvatabhodinā pavinā vajreṇa trāyate arthāt devān /
GK16visa07cu:2809: ambhaḥ kīdṛśaṃ naraṃkasya pāpajanyayātanāyā jaitraṃ nāśakamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2810: atra hariṃ śrīkṛṣṇarūpaṃ viṣṇumiveti dṛṣṭāntaḥ so 'pi narakasya narakāsurasya jaitraḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2811: ambhaḥ kīdṛśam---bahumataṃ bahujanasammataṃ gahanaṃ nibiḍaṃ ca pravāhātiśayād atra hariṃ siṃhamiveti dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2814: na cātra harimevetyatrānavīkṛtatvaṃ kathitapadatvaṃ vā doṣa iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:2817: (lo, e) parvateti--gaṅgājalapakṣe parvataṃ bhettuṃ śīlaṃ yasya /
GK16visa07cu:2819: indrapakṣe parvatabhodinā pavinā vajreṇa trāyata iti /
GK16visa07cu:2833: pravarttikāṃ prakṛtimāmananti vadanti sattvarajastamasāṃ samyāvasthā prakṛtiḥ tata
GK16visa07cu:2836: tathā ca tvāmeva puruṣaṃ sarvakarttṛpuruṣaṃ viduḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2837: tatra kiṃ pramāṇamityata āha---taddarśinamiti---tata eva darśanaṃ jñānaṃ yasya tādṛśam /
GK16visa07cu:2849: yaduktam--- prakṛteḥ kiyamāṇāni guṇaiḥ karmāṇi sarvaśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2856: yathā---“yuktaḥ kalābhistamasāṃ vivṛddhyai kṣīṇaśca tābhiḥ kṣataye ya eṣām /
GK16visa07cu:2860: (vi, ra) svayaṃ vāpi parāmarśe iti kārikāpādastatrāpratītatvaṃ guṇa iti pūrvoktamanusañjayati---apratītatvamiti /
GK16visa07cu:2861: yuktaḥ kalābhiriti--taṃ paramātmasvarūpaṃ candraṃ pariśīlayāmi satataṃ bhāvayāmi ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2864: kālābhaiḥ śarīraparigrahecchārūpābhiḥ kalābhiḥ dharmaiḥ viśiṣṭaḥ san yastamasāṃ śarīrātmanorabhedābodharūpāṇāṃ mohānāṃ vivṛddhyai bhavati yathā rāmaśarīraparigrahe /
GK16visa07cu:2865: anyacandrastu svīyaṣoḍaśāṃśarūpābhiḥ kalābhiryuktaḥ san tamasāmandhakāraṇāṃ kṣataye eva bhavati /
GK16visa07cu:2866: tathā tābhiḥ kalābhaiḥ hīnaḥ sanneṣāṃ tamasāṃ kṣataye bhavati /
GK16visa07cu:2868: anyacandrastu kalāhīnaḥ san tamovivṛddhye eva bhavati /
GK16visa07cu:2869: tamonāśakakalābhāvena tasya tamo vṛddhīṃ prati yatsattve 'grimakṣaṇe yasya sattvaṃ yadasattve 'grimakṣaṇe yadasattvaṃ tattasya kāraṇamityevaṃrūpakāraṇatvāt
GK16visa07cu:2873: atra kalātamaḥ padārthau apratītāvapi svayaṃ parāmarśe guṇau parāpratīteruddeśyatvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2899: udayasavituruddeśe vihitasya tāmratvasya astamayasavituruddeśenāpi vidheyatayā pratinirdeśarūpo 'nuvāda ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2935: dvyarthatvena tadyogyatā--viśeṣyadvayer'thadvayāttu niścaya eva tathā padārthamāha---guṇa eveti /
GK16visa07cu:2939: tvatto dhanalābhe tupaścāt samaṃ na bhaviṣyati iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2940: pṛthūni kārttasvarasya suvarṇasya pātrāṇi yatra rājasadanaṃ tādṛśam /
GK16visa07cu:2941: pṛthukānāṃ śiśūnām ārttasvarasya pātraṃ daridrasadanaṃ bhakṣyābhāvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2942: bhūṣitāḥ suvarṇadimāṇḍitāḥ niḥ śeṣaparijanāḥ yatra rājasadanaṃ tādṛśam /
GK16visa07cu:2943: bhuvi uṣitāḥ suptāḥ niḥ śeṣaparijanā yatra daridrasadanaṃ tādṛśaṃ śayyāvirahāt /
GK16visa07cu:2945: vilasatkā bile tiṣṭhanto mūṣikapipīllikādayasteṣāṃ reṇubhiḥ gahanaṃ daridrasadanam /
GK16visa07cu:2950: (lo, au) pṛthviti---pṛthukānāṃ balānām ārttasvarasya pātraṃ sthānam /
GK16visa07cu:2953: vilasantaḥ tiṣṭhanta eva vilasatkā reṇavo dhūlayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2969: dīdhīvevīṅ iti kaścijjano guṇavṛddhyorabhājanaṃ guṇavṛddhyā ca hīna ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2970: dīdhīvevīṅ dhātvoriḍāgamasya ca samastayorapi guṇasya tadvādhikāyā vṛddheścābhāvāt /
GK16visa07cu:2972: yatra jane sannihite sati tatsannihitasyāpi na te guṇavṛddhī,
GK16visa07cu:2981: kvippratyayanibhaḥ kvipaḥ sarvāpahārīti lopād ripoḥ sarvanāśaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:2982: atra na kevalaṃ duḥ śravatvaṃ kaṣṭatvaṃ ca /
GK16visa07cu:2994: atra loke tvāmahaṃ kadācana na atārpsam /
GK16visa07cu:2996: asya vaiyākaraṇasya vaktṛtve kaṣṭatvaṃ duḥ śravatvamapi guṇa ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3003: ede assasamohā paḍanti āsāsu duddhadhāra vva” //
GK16visa07cu:3011: ete cāsya mayūkhāḥ patīnti āśāsu dugdhadhārā iva //
GK16visa07cu:3013: (vi, ka) hyo godohodbhavaṃ ghṛtaṃ haiyaṅgavīna bhakṣyalampaṭasyoktau bhakṣyadravyadṛṣṭānto 'tra gramyo guṇaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3016: eso iti--- “eṣaḥ śaśadharabimbo dṛśyate haiyaṅgavīnapiṇḍa iva /
GK16visa07cu:3017: ete cāsya mayūkhāḥ patantyāśāsu dugdhadhārā iva” //
GK16visa07cu:3019: nirhetutā tu khyāter'the doṣatāṃ naiva gacchati /
GK16visa07cu:3021: kavīnāṃ samaye khyāte guṇaḥ khyātaviruddhatā // VisSd_7.22 //
GK16visa07cu:3024: yaśasi dhavalatā varṇyate hāsakīrtyoḥ raktau ca krodharāgau;
GK16visa07cu:3026: toyādhāre 'khile 'pi prasarati ca marālādikaḥ pakṣisaṅgho jyotsnā peyā cakorairjaladharasamaye mānasaṃ yānti haṃsāḥ // VisSd_7.23 //
GK16visa07cu:3029: (vi, kha) sampratīti---sandhyāsamayasya cakravākadvandvavighaṭakatve teṣāṃ khyātisattvānnātra hetvākāṅkṣā /
GK16visa07cu:3036: pādāghātādaśokaṃ vikasati bakulaṃ yoṣitāmāsyamadyair- yūnāmaṅgeṣu hārāḥ,
GK16visa07cu:3038: maurvīrolambamālā dhanuratha viśikhāḥ kausumāḥ puṣpaketo- rbhinnaṃ syādasya bāṇairyuvajanahṛdayaṃ strīkaṭākṣeṇa tadvat // VisSd_7.24 //
GK16visa07cu:3043: (lo, i) hāro hṛdayaṃ ca sphuṭatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3049: candrikā śuklapakṣe meghadhvāneṣu nṛtyaṃ bhavati ca śikhināṃ nāpyaśoke phalaṃ syāt /
GK16visa07cu:3051: na ca kusumaphale gandhasāradrumāṇā- mityādyunneyamanyatkavisamayagataṃ satkavīnāṃ prabandhe // VisSd_7.25 //
GK16visa07cu:3056: atra jyāśabdenāpi gatārthatve dhanuḥ śabdena jyāyā dhanuṣyāyattīkaraṇaṃ bodhyate /
GK16visa07cu:3072: tadvodhaśca dhanuḥ śabdādau dhanurārūḍhatvaṃ lakṣaṇayā rūḍhihetukayā luptaṣaṣṭyartho vā ārūḍhatvam /
GK16visa07cu:3073: gatārthatvepīti--na ca jyāśabdārthaḥ kathaṃ dhanurjyātvasya saṃsthānaviśeṣavyaṅgyajātiviśeṣa iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:3074: jyātvasya jātitve 'pi tatsambandhino dhanuṣo namayataḥ smārakatvena tadvaśādeva dhanurlābhe,
GK16visa07cu:3077: na caivaṃ karṇasthaitalakṣaṇāyāmapi karṇasthitakarṇabhūṣā iti bodhanenaiva punaruktiriti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:3079: evaṃ śravaṇeti--etaddvaye padādhikyasyaiva prasāktiḥ kuṇḍalatvakirīṭatvayoḥ saṃsthānavyaṅgyajātitvādeva /
GK16visa07cu:3081: evaṃ nirupapado mālāśabdaḥ puṣpastrajamevābhidhatta iti sthitāvapi “puṣpamālāvibhāti te” /
GK16visa07cu:3088: utkṛṣṭapuṣpaprasiddhyai iti puṣpāṃśo mālāśabdārtha eva puṣpaśabdasya tu utkṛṣṭe lakṣaṇetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3091: muktāṃśo 'pi hāraśabdārtha eva ityato 'trāpi punaruktereva prasiktiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3099: (vi, ca) satkāvyasthitā eveti---yataḥ satkāvye sthitā ato nibaddhavyā evetyanvayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3107: māti māmalamiti kṣāmākṣarollāpinī suptā kiṃ nu mṛtā nu kiṃ manasi me līnā vilīnā nu kim” //
GK16visa07cu:3112: gāṭhāliṅganena vāmanīkṛtakucā cāsau prodbhinnaromodramā ceti samāsaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3114: sāndrasneharasātirekeṇa vigalat śrīmato nitambādambaraṃ yasyāstādṛśaviśeṣaṇadvayavatī sā mama nāyikā pīḍayetyanuktivaśāt, he mānada /
GK16visa07cu:3115: māṃ mā mā mā ityalimityevamalakṣarollāpinī satī suptetyādivitarkacatuṣṭayaviṣayo 'bhūdityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3117: manogatatvena manasi layavitarkaḥ manasoradyāpi abahirbhāvāt atyantalayarūpasya vilayasya vitarkaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3120: kim ? uktarūpā priyā mama manasi suptā nu /
GK16visa07cu:3122: suptāpi punarutthāya pātītyāśaṅkyāha mṛtā nu kim ?
GK16visa07cu:3125: tathābhūtāpi kenacid vyāvarttayituṃ śakyetetyata āhavilīneti--dugdhre jalavat sarvathā bhedopalambhābhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3128: etatpratipādikāyā nāyikāyāḥ sāndrānandajaḍībhūtatayā saṅkīrṇavākyoccāraṇe 'pyasāmarthyaṃ vyanaktīti nyūnapadatvaṃ guṇaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3134: “tiṣṭhetkopavaśātprabhāvapihitā dīrghaṃ na sā kupyati svargāyotpatitā bhavenmayi punarbhāvārdramasyā manaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3135: tāṃ hartuṃ vibudhadviṣo 'pi na ca me śaktāḥ purovartinīṃ sā cātyantamagocaraṃ nayanayorjāteti ko 'yaṃ vidhiḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:3139: sā urvaśī svaprabhāvena pihitā adṛśyā tiṣṭhaditi vitarkyāha--dīrghaṃ na sā iti evaṃ svargāya iti vitarkyāha---mayi punariti /
GK16visa07cu:3140: asyā asureṇa haraṇakoṭistu asambhavyā ityāha---tāṃ hartumiti /
GK16visa07cu:3142: ato 'darśane hetvabhāvāna vismayādāha---sā ceti---agocaram agocaratvaṃ yātā prāptā /
GK16visa07cu:3144: atra prabhāvapihitetiṃ bhavediti cetyanantaraṃ “naitadyataḥ” iti padāni nyūnāni /
GK16visa07cu:3146: “dīrghaṃ na se” tyādivākyajanyayā ca pratipattyā tiṣṭhedityādivākyapratipatterbodhaḥ sphuṭamevāvabhāsata iti na doṣaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3149: (vi, jha) atreti---pūrvoktasya niṣedhaṃ pratyeva dīrghaṃ na sā ityanayoḥ hetutvāt natu pūrvapratītiṃ prati iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3151: doṣatvaṃ tu syādityata āha--dīrghaṃ na setyādīti /
GK16visa07cu:3153: tathā ca “naitadyataḥ“ityasyākāṅkṣāvaśādadhyāhāro 'pi na doṣāya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3164: tanna na jāne jāne spṛśati manaḥ kiṃ tu naiva niṣṭhuratām” //
GK16visa07cu:3173: (vi, ña) guṇaḥ kvāpīti---yatrādhikapadasya rūḍhilakṣaṇayā arthāntaraṃ tatretyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3174: ācāratīti---manaso 'pyagocarānarthāt asadarthān sahasā yat durjana ācarati tadahaṃ na na jāne /
GK16visa07cu:3176: kintu mama bhanaḥ niṣṭhuratāṃ naiva spṛśati ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3180: samāptapunarā ttatvaṃ na doṣo na guṇaḥ kvacit /
GK16visa07cu:3183: evaṃ ca viśeṣaṇamātrasya punarupādāne samāptapunarāttatvaṃ na vākyāntarasyeti vijñeyam /
GK16visa07cu:3186: (vi, ṭa) anyastā ityatra pūrvārddhena vākyasamāptāvapi kathamatra niṣpādakaguṇaratnādīnāṃ vailakṣaṇyamityākāṅkṣotthānādadoṣatā /
GK16visa07cu:3189: viśeṣaṇe ākāṅkṣāsattve tu na doṣa iti prāgeva darśitam /
GK16visa07cu:3191: na vākyatvaviśeṣaṇatvayoriti sthitena vākyāntarasyeti yaduktaṃ tadvākyāntare ākāṅkṣā avaśyaṃ tiṣṭhatītyabhiprāyeṇaiva /
GK16visa07cu:3200: “diṅmātaṅgaghaṭāvibhaktacaturāghāṭā mahī sādhyate siddhā sāpi vadanta eva hi vayaṃ romāñjitāḥ paśyata /
GK16visa07cu:3201: viprāya pratipādyate kimaparaṃ rāmāya tasmai namo yasmātprādurabhūtkathādbhutamidaṃ yatraiva cāstaṃ matam” //
GK16visa07cu:3202: atra vadanta evetyādi vākyaṃ vākyāntarapraveśāt camatkārātiśayaṃ puṣṇāti /
GK16visa07cu:3207: tathā ca diṅmātaṅgaghaṭābhirvibhaktāścatvāraḥ paryantāḥ yasyāḥ tādṛśī mahī yena rāmeṇa sādhyate /
GK16visa07cu:3208: siddhā vyāghātaśūnyasādhanena svavaśīkṛtā sāpi mahī viprāya pratipādyate /
GK16visa07cu:3210: tasmai rāmāya nama idaṃ kāthādbhutaṃ yasmāt prādurabhūt anyairatathākāraṇāt yasmādeva prādurabhūdityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3212: kenāpyutrakālaṃ tathākaraṇādastaṃ gatamityevaṃ vadanta eva vayaṃ romāñcitā eva idaṃ paśyatetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3227: bhīma ityatra sukumāratayā varṇānāmasamāsena ca sukumāratayetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3243: (vi, ṇa) vibhāvānubhāvakṛteti---vyabhicāribhāvasya yau vibhāvānubhāvau tābhyāṃ vyaṅgyatvarūpāyā vyabhicāribhāvasya puṣṭistadrāhityamevetyarthaḥ
GK16visa07cu:3247: “autsukyena kṛtasvarā sahabhuvā vyāvartamānā hriyā taistairbandhuvadhūjanasya vacanairnotābhimukhyaṃ punaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3248: dṛṣṭvāgre varamāttasādhvasarasā gaurī nave sahgame saṃhohatpulakā hareṇa hasatā śliṣṭā śivāyāstu vaḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:3252: gaurī nave saṃgame prathamadine harasānnidhyanimittamautsukyena kṛtatvārānantaraṃ ca sahabhuvā sāhajikayā hriyā vyāvarttamānā tataśca taistairityādi
GK16visa07cu:3253: tataśca varaṃ svāminaṃ haram agre dṛṣṭvā āttasādhvasarūparasā,
GK16visa07cu:3254: tataśca hasatā hareṇaśliṣṭā satī saṃrohatpulakā īdṛśī vaḥ śivāyāstu /
GK16visa07cu:3261: yathā lajjādipratipādranaṃ tathā sahasā prasāraṇarūpānubhāvamukhena autsukyasya pratipādane
GK16visa07cu:3264: atrautsukyasya tvarārūpānubhāvamukhena pratipādane saṅgame na jhaṭiti pratītiḥ,
GK16visa07cu:3273: evaṃ hriyo 'pyanubhāvavyāvarttanāt na jhaṭiti tatpratītiḥ ityataḥ tasyāpi hriyeti śabdasya vācyatvaṃ na doṣa ityāha---hriyo 'nubhāvasya ceti
GK16visa07cu:3275: sādhvasaṃ bhayaṃ hāsaśca hāsyahetuścetovikāsaḥ sthāyibhāvalakṣaṇe darśitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3276: taddvayaṃ ca bhayānakahāsyarasayoḥ sthāyibhāvāvapi gauramaheśayoḥ śṛṅgare 'tra vyabhicārabhāvau /
GK16visa07cu:3280: maheśahāsaścoddīpanavibhāvastataśca sādhvasahāsāvanupādāya yadi sakampā iti kriyeta
GK16visa07cu:3281: tadā tadaṅgasarpadarśanāt bhayena ārdragajacarmakapāladarśanāt jugupsayā ca śṛṅgārapratikūlābhyāṃ
GK16visa07cu:3282: tatkampasambhavāt na śṛṅgāravyabhicāriṇoḥ sādhvasahāsayoreva vyañjanā syāt,
GK16visa07cu:3291: yathā--“kvākāryaṃ śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kva ca kulam-” ityādi /
GK16visa07cu:3297: viruddharasīyasyāpi tasya balavatā bādhyasya bādhyatvena kathanaṃ virodhino jaye yathātathā guṇaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3304: kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ pāsyatyanena vyaṅgyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3306: virādhino 'pi smaraṇo sāmyena vacane 'pi vā // VisSd_7.30 //
GK16visa07cu:3310: (vi, dha) virodhino 'pi iti---virodhirasasyāpi sañcāryyādeḥ smaraṇi smaryyamāṇatvena vyañjitasya vacane sāmyena vathane 'pi prakṛtarasena saha na virodho bhavet /
GK16visa07cu:3315: atrālambanavicchede raterarasātmatayā smaryamāṇānāṃ tadaṅgānāṃ śokoddīpakatayā kuṇānukūlatā /
GK16visa07cu:3331: nṛpā ruṣā bhejire prapedire priyatamayā iva /
GK16visa07cu:3336: strutaṃ kṣaritaṃ ghanaṃ gharmatoyaṃ rājñāṃ yataḥ,
GK16visa07cu:3338: strutaṃ niḥ sṛtaṃ ghanaṃ gharmatoyaṃ gātrāt yasyāstādṛśyā priyatamayā /
GK16visa07cu:3343: priyatamayā tu svīyakarāhatyā pṛthoḥ svorudeśarūpasya pīṭhasya dhvananam /
GK16visa07cu:3354: ekasasthāyibhāvo 'pi anyarase vyabhicāribhāva ityato raudrasasthāyibhāvaḥ krodho
GK16visa07cu:3357: nanu priyatamayā iva ityuktyā priyatamaiva sāmyena vivakṣitā,
GK16visa07cu:3367: “ekaṃ dhyānimīlanānmukulitaprāyaṃ dvitīyaṃ punaḥ pārvatyā vadanāmbujastanabhare sambhogabhāvālasam /
GK16visa07cu:3373: samādhisamaye vibhinnarasaṃ śambhoḥ netratrayaṃ vaḥ pātu /
GK16visa07cu:3383: dūre vikṛṣṭacāpo yo madanaḥ tadviṣaye krodhānalenoddīpitamityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3384: atra raudrarasasthāyibhāvasya krodhasya vācyatve 'pyuddīpanena tadanubhāvena punarvyañjanā aparāṅgatetyāha---atreti /
GK16visa07cu:3388: (lo, a) atra śānteti---aṅgino bhagavadviṣayaratibhāvasya aṅgabhāvena viruddhānāmapi śāntādīnāṃ nānyo 'nyavirodha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3391: “kṣipto hastāvalagnaḥ prasabhamabhihato 'pyādadānoṃ'śukāntaṃ gṛhṇan keśeṣvapāstaścaraṇanipatito nekṣitaḥ saṃbhrameṇa /
GK16visa07cu:3392: āliṅgan yo 'vadhūtastripurayuvatibhaiḥ sāśrunetrotpalābhiḥ kāmīvārdrāparādhaḥ sa dahatu duritaṃ śāmbhavo vaḥ śarāgniḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:3395: (vi, bha) itthamaṅgini virodhināṃ sākṣādavirodhaṃ darśayitvā sākṣāt paramparābhyāṃ tādṛśānāmavirodhamāha---yathā vā---kṣipta iti /
GK16visa07cu:3396: tripurudāhe sa prasiddhaḥ śāmbhavaḥ śarāgnirvo duritaṃ dahatu /
GK16visa07cu:3397: kīdṛśaḥ hastāvalagnaḥ san sāśrunetrotpalābhistripurayuvatibhirārdraparādhaḥ kāmīva kṣiptaḥ evamaṃśukasyāntamādadāno 'pi abhihataḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3400: kāmipakṣe---cumbanārthaṃ keśagrahaṇaṃ tathā caraṇanipātato 'gniḥ sambhrameṇa bhayena nekṣitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3401: kāmī tu caraṇanipatitaḥ saṃbhrameṇādareṇa yat īkṣaṇaṃ tadviṣayo na kṛtaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3406: tasyāḥ paripoṣakatayā bhagavatastripuradhvaṃsaṃ pratyutsāhasyāparipuṣṭatayā rasapadavīmaprāptatayā bhāvamātrasya karuṇo 'ṅgam /
GK16visa07cu:3408: evaṃ cāviśrāntidhāmatayā karuṇasyāpyaṅgataiveti dvayorapi karuṇaśṛṅgārayorbhagavadutsāhaparipuṣṭatadviṣayaratibhāvāsvādaprakaṣrakatayā yaugapadyasambhāvādaṅgatvena na virodhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3412: sa dahatu ityādi nirākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyatvāt ṣa tasyāśceti /
GK16visa07cu:3418: sa cātra vyaṅgya ityato vīrarasa evātra pradhānam /
GK16visa07cu:3419: tat kathaṃ ratibhāvasya prādhānyamuktam ityata āha---tasya cāparipuṣṭatayā iti /
GK16visa07cu:3420: tasyotsāhasya sākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyatvena dahatviti nirākāṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyakavibhāvāṅgatvenāprādhānyarūpayā aparipuṣṭatayā rasapadavīmanāptatayā bhāvamātrasya sthāyibhāvasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3427: itthaṃ bhagavadutsāhapuṣṭasya bhagavadviṣayakavibhāvasya sākṣātparamparābhyāmaṅgabhūtau karaṇaśṛṅgārau virodhisvarūpau api aviruddhau iti darśayati---evaṃ cāviśrāntīti /
GK16visa07cu:3430: bhagavadutsāhastu aṅgamapi bhāvasyāvirodhitvāt tadvirodho na darśitaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3432: smaryyamāṇasya vibhāvādisāmyasya vivakṣādhīnavivakṣitasāmyasya aṅgirasena saha virodhaprasaktāvapi na virodhaityuktam,
GK16visa07cu:3443: tathā hi yāsāṃ tripurayuvatīnāṃ praṇayaroṣanivāraṇārthaṃ kāmī nirākṛtahastagrahaṇāni kṛtavān /
GK16visa07cu:3444: tāsveva niṣkaruṇāsu śāmbhavaḥ śarāgnistathā ceṣṭitavāniti sādṛśyasaṃdarśanāt smaryyamāṇenerṣyavipralambhena karuṇaḥ pratyuta puṣṭaṃ nītaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3447: nanu samūhālambanātmakapūrṇaghanānandarūpasya rasasya tādṛśenetararasena kathaṃ virodhaḥ sambhāvanīyaḥ ?
GK16visa07cu:3454: rasasya aṅgirasasya tādṛśena smaryamāṇena vivakṣitasāmyena vā rasena saha kathaṃ
GK16visa07cu:3459: tulyabalatvābhāvena pradhānabhūtena nirākāṅkṣavidheyavākyena vyaṅgyatayā pradhānena aṅhirasena balavatā smaryamāṇopamānayoreva upamardanāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3460: na cāyaṃ sa rasanotkarṣotyādau nirākāṅkṣavākyaireva smaryamāṇaśṛṅgāra iti vācyam /
GK16visa07cu:3462: teṣāṃ vidheyapātityaṃ tu karuṇavyañjakameva śṛṅgārasya vyaṅgyatve 'pi parokṣatvādeva smaryamāṇatopacāra iti bodhyam /
GK16visa07cu:3472: kṣipta ityādivākyānāṃ kāmīva ityādivākyasya canirākāṅkṣatvena tadvyaṅgyatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3493: ata evātra pradhānetareṣu raseṣu svātantryaviśrāmarāhityātpūrṇarasabhāvamātrācca vilakṣaṇatayā saṃcārirasanāmnā vyapadeśaḥ prācyānām /
GK16visa07cu:3498: ekavākyavyaṅgyatvābhāve 'pi dvayornirākaṅkṣavākyavyaṅgyatve 'pi ca śṛṅgāravati karuṇāpratītyā virodhāprasaktirastyeva /
GK16visa07cu:3499: kintu smaryamāṇaśṛṅgārapekṣayā anubhūyamānasyopamānaśṛṅgārāpekṣayā upameyasya ca karuṇasya paryantikapratītiviṣayatayā prādhānyam /
GK16visa07cu:3500: evaṃ karuṇāpekṣayā bhagavati kavibhāvasya ca pāryantikapratītiviṣayatvena prādhānyam /
GK16visa07cu:3501: ityataḥ tādṛśapradhānetareṣu karuṇetaratra śṛṅgāre bhāvetaratra karuṇe ślokāntare
GK16visa07cu:3520: ekapadyabodhyatārūpāt saṃsargāt yadi rasāntare aṅgaprakarṣakaṃ syāttadā bādhya ityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3524: atathābhūtasya ca bādhyatvaṃ svaṇḍarasatvaṃ ca ityuktam /
GK16visa07cu:3526: (lo, u) yadyaṅgī rasaḥ aparipuṣṭatayā bhāvamātravailakṣaṇyenāpātatamātrataḥ prādhānyenābhivyaktaḥ samagraṃ nāsvādyata iti pastantratvāt,
GK16visa07cu:3533: (vi, śa) yatra tu kapole jānakyā ityatra vilodhinoḥ śṛṅgāravīrarasayornedṛśo bādhyabādhakabhāvastatra
GK16visa07cu:3534: tayoḥ kathaṃ sanniveśa ityāśaṅkya tu vīraśṛṅgārayorvirodhaṃ paroktaṃ darśayati---nanvādya iti /
GK16visa07cu:3536: ityuktanayena viruddhayoḥ kathamekatra vīraśṛṅgārayoḥ sanniveśa ityanvayaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3542: muhuḥ paśyañchṛṇvan rajanicarasenākalakalaṃ jaṭājūṭgranthiṃ draḍhayati raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ” //
GK16visa07cu:3547: ślokārthastu raghūṇāṃ parivṛḍhaḥ prabhuḥ rāmaḥ jānakyā vaktrakamalaṃ muhuḥ paśyan kharadūṣaṇādirajanicarasenākalakalaṃ śṛṇvān jaṭājūṭasya jaṭāsamūhasya granthiṃ draḍhayati /
GK16visa07cu:3548: vaktrakamalaṃ kīdṛśaṃ karikalabhadantadyutimuṣi kapole smareṇajānakīniṣṭhena rāmaviṣayakasmareṇa
GK16visa07cu:3549: smeraḥ harṣaprāyaḥ sphārī vistṛtaḥ uḍḍāmaro bāhulyāt udbhaṭaḥ pulako yasya tādṛśaṃ
GK16visa07cu:3552: jaṭājuṭadraḍhanavyaṅgyo vīrarasaśca parasparamabādhyatam anaṅgatāṃ cāpannau svātantryeṇa upalabhyeti /
GK16visa07cu:3555: atrocyate---iha khalu rasānāṃ virodhitāyā avirodhitāyāśca tridhā vyavasthā /
GK16visa07cu:3572: tridhāpyālambanetyādinā kapole jānakyā ityādau bhinne ālambane vīrasya rajanīcarasenā,
GK16visa07cu:3575: evaṃ ca vīrasya nāyakaniṣṭhatvena bhayānakasya pratināyakaniṣṭhatvena nibandhe bhinānaśrayatvena na virodhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3580: rajanīcarālambanakastu vīrarasa ityavirodha iti samādhāsyan āha---atrecyate /
GK16visa07cu:3583: tatra yasya yena saha vilodhastaṃ darśayati---tatra vīraśṛṅgārayoriti /
GK16visa07cu:3587: yathā mama---prauḍhāmādāya bhītiṃ manasi sarabhasaṃ prāpya lokāpakīrtiṃ naiva stokāpyapekṣākriyata pathi pathi prāktanāsu priyāsu /
GK16visa07cu:3588: śrīmanniḥ śaṅkabhānoḥ samaraparisaradbhīmmaniḥ sīmasenā- niḥ śāṇasvānaśaṅkākulamapasaratāṃ pañcagauḍeśvereṇa /
GK16visa07cu:3591: yaśca nāgānande praśamāśrayasyāpi jīmūtavāhanasya malayavatyanurāgo darśitaḥ,
GK16visa07cu:3592: tatra “aho gītamaho vāditram” ityadbhutasyāntarā niveśanānnairantaryābhāvānna śāntaśṛṅgārayorvirodhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3596: (vi, ha) nanu śāntaśṛṅgārayornairantaryye virodhaścet kathaṃ nāgānande na tathā nibaddhamityata āha---yattviti /
GK16visa07cu:3600: (lo, ḷ) śāntaśṛṅgārayornairantaryyavirodhinorna paraṃ prabandhe yāvadekasminnapi vākye virādhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3602: saśoṇitaiḥ kavyabhujāṃ sphuradbhiḥ pakṣaiḥ khagānāmupavījyamānān saṃvījitāścandanavārisekaiḥ sugandhibhiḥ kalpalatādukūlaiḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3603: vimānaparyyaṅkatale niṣaṇṇāḥ kutūhalāviṣṭatayā tadānīm nirddiśyamānān lalanāṅgulibhirvorāḥ svadehān patitānapaśyan /
GK16visa07cu:3607: “pāṇḍukṣāmaṃ vadanam-” ityādau ca pāṇḍutādīnāmaṅgabhāvaḥ karuṇavipralambhe 'pīti na virodhaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3610: (vi, ka) nanu paripanthirasāṅgasya vibhāvādeḥ parigraho doṣa ityuktam,
GK16visa07cu:3611: tatkatham “pāṇḍu kṣāmaṃ vadanaṃ hṛdayaṃ sarasaṃ tavālasaṃ ca vapuḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3613: “ityādau śṛṅgārasīye mālatīmādhavīye śloke śṛṅgāraparipanthikaruṇānubhāvasya vadanapāṇḍutādeḥ sattve 'pi aduṣṭatānubhava ityata āha---pāṇḍu kṣāmam iti /
GK16visa07cu:3615: he sakhi / tava pāṇḍukṣāmavadanādikaṃ tava hṛdantaḥ kṣetriyarogam asmin kṣetre śarīre 'cikitsyaṃ rogamāvedayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3620: ubhayīyatve tu prakaraṇasācivyāt prakṛtasabodhāt na doṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3623: yadi khalu pāṇḍutvādīnāṃ vipralambhāpekṣayādhikā karuṇāṅgatā bhavet tadaiva doṣaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GK16visa07cu:3626: anukāre ca sarveṣāṃ doṣāṇāṃ naiva doṣatā // VisSd_7.31 //
GK16visa07cu:3638: adoṣatā ca guṇatā jñeyā cānubhayātmatā // VisSd_7.32 //
GK16visa07cu:3647: doṣatāguṇatayorvyātireko hi na doṣatā na guṇatā /
GK16visa07cu:3656: iti sāhityadarpaṇe doṣanirūpaṇo nāma saptamaḥ paricchedaḥ /
